import js from &#39;@eslint/js&#39;;
import reactHooks from &#39;eslint-plugin-react-hooks&#39;;
import reactRefresh from &#39;eslint-plugin-react-refresh&#39;;
import { globalIgnores } from &#39;eslint/config&#39;;
import globals from &#39;globals&#39;;
import tseslint from &#39;typescript-eslint&#39;;

export default tseslint.config([
  globalIgnores([&#39;dist&#39;]),
  {
    files: [&#39;**/*.{ts,tsx}&#39;],
    extends: [
      js.configs.recommended,
      tseslint.configs.recommended,
      reactHooks.configs[&#39;recommended-latest&#39;],
      reactRefresh.configs.vite,
    ],
    languageOptions: {
      ecmaVersion: 2020,
      globals: globals.browser,
    },
  },
]);

    &lt;/div&gt;

📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/diagrams/DataViewer.tsx
import React, { useState } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { Copy, Check } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;

interface DataViewerProps {
  data: string | object;
  language?: &#39;yaml&#39; | &#39;json&#39; | &#39;javascript&#39; | &#39;typescript&#39; | &#39;cue&#39;;
  title?: string;
  className?: string;
  showCopyButton?: boolean;
}

export const DataViewer: React.FC&lt;DataViewerProps&gt; = ({
  data,
  language = &#39;yaml&#39;,
  title,
  className = &#39;&#39;,
  showCopyButton = true,
}) =&gt; {
  const [copied, setCopied] = useState(false);

  const dataString = typeof data === &#39;string&#39; ? data : JSON.stringify(data, null, 2);

  const handleCopy = async () =&gt; {
    try {
      await navigator.clipboard.writeText(dataString);
      setCopied(true);
      setTimeout(() =&gt; setCopied(false), 2000);
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(&#39;Failed to copy:&#39;, err);
    }
  };

  const getLanguageClass = () =&gt; {
    switch (language) {
      case &#39;json&#39;:
        return &#39;language-json&#39;;
      case &#39;javascript&#39;:
        return &#39;language-javascript&#39;;
      case &#39;typescript&#39;:
        return &#39;language-typescript&#39;;
      case &#39;cue&#39;:
        return &#39;language-cue&#39;;
      default:
        return &#39;language-yaml&#39;;
    }
  };

  return (
    &lt;div className={`relative ${className}`}&gt;
      {title &amp;&amp; (
        &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center justify-between mb-3&quot;&gt;
          &lt;h4 className=&quot;text-sm font-semibold text-gray-700&quot;&gt;{title}&lt;/h4&gt;
          {showCopyButton &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;button
              onClick={handleCopy}
              className=&quot;flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-1 text-xs text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded transition-colors&quot;
              title={copied ? &#39;Copied!&#39; : &#39;Copy to clipboard&#39;}
            &gt;
              {copied ? (
                &lt;&gt;
                  &lt;Check className=&quot;w-3 h-3&quot; /&gt;
                  Copied
                &lt;/&gt;
              ) : (
                &lt;&gt;
                  &lt;Copy className=&quot;w-3 h-3&quot; /&gt;
                  Copy
                &lt;/&gt;
              )}
            &lt;/button&gt;
          )}
        &lt;/div&gt;
      )}

      &lt;div className=&quot;bg-gray-900 text-gray-100 p-4 rounded-lg overflow-auto max-h-96 text-sm font-mono&quot;&gt;
        &lt;pre className={getLanguageClass()}&gt;
          &lt;code&gt;{dataString}&lt;/code&gt;
        &lt;/pre&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
};

export default DataViewer;
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/Handlers/index.ts
/**
 * Webhook Handlers Components
 */

export { default as Handlers } from &#39;./Handlers&#39;;
export { default as HandlersList } from &#39;./HandlersList&#39;;
export { default as HandlerEditor } from &#39;./HandlerEditor&#39;;
export { default as HandlerStats } from &#39;./HandlerStats&#39;;
export { default as HandlersErrorBoundary } from &#39;./HandlersErrorBoundary&#39;;
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/Layout/Tabs.tsx
/**
 * Tab component for organizing content
 */

import React from &#39;react&#39;;
import { clsx } from &#39;clsx&#39;;
import type { TabsProps, TabItem } from &#39;../../types/ui&#39;;

export function Tabs({ activeTab, onTabChange, tabs, className }: TabsProps) {
  const activeTabContent = tabs.find(tab =&gt; tab.id === activeTab)?.content;

  return (
    &lt;div className={clsx(&#39;flex flex-col h-full min-h-0&#39;, className)}&gt;
      {/* Tab headers */}
      &lt;div className=&quot;flex border-b border-gray-200 bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;
        {tabs.map(tab =&gt; (
          &lt;TabHeader
            key={tab.id}
            tab={tab}
            isActive={tab.id === activeTab}
            onClick={() =&gt; !tab.disabled &amp;&amp; onTabChange(tab.id)}
          /&gt;
        ))}
      &lt;/div&gt;

      {/* Tab content */}
      &lt;div className=&quot;flex-1 min-h-0 min-w-0 overflow-hidden&quot;&gt;{activeTabContent}&lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
}

interface TabHeaderProps {
  tab: TabItem;
  isActive: boolean;
  onClick: () =&gt; void;
}

function TabHeader({ tab, isActive, onClick }: TabHeaderProps) {
  return (
    &lt;button
      type=&quot;button&quot;
      className={clsx(
        &#39;px-4 py-2 font-medium text-sm border-b-2 transition-colors duration-150&#39;,
        &#39;focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-inset&#39;,
        isActive
          ? &#39;border-blue-500 text-blue-600 bg-white&#39;
          : &#39;border-transparent text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:border-gray-300&#39;,
        tab.disabled &amp;&amp; &#39;opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed&#39;
      )}
      onClick={onClick}
      disabled={tab.disabled}
      aria-selected={isActive}
      role=&quot;tab&quot;
    &gt;
      &lt;span className=&quot;flex items-center gap-2&quot;&gt;
        {tab.label}
        {tab.badge &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;span
            className={clsx(
              &#39;inline-flex items-center justify-center px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium&#39;,
              isActive ? &#39;bg-blue-100 text-blue-800&#39; : &#39;bg-gray-200 text-gray-600&#39;
            )}
          &gt;
            {tab.badge}
          &lt;/span&gt;
        )}
      &lt;/span&gt;
    &lt;/button&gt;
  );
}

export default Tabs;

import { defineConfig } from &#39;vite&#39;;

  plugins: [react()],
  server: {
    port: 3000,
  },
  build: {
    target: &#39;es2022&#39;,
    sourcemap: true,
  },
  test: {
    globals: true,
    environment: &#39;jsdom&#39;,
    setupFiles: [&#39;./src/test-setup.ts&#39;],
  },
});
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/diagrams/SplitViewShowcase.tsx
import React from &#39;react&#39;;
import { Card } from &#39;../../design-system/components/Card&#39;;

interface SplitViewShowcaseProps {
  title: string;
  description?: string;
  dataPanel: React.ReactNode;
  diagramPanel: React.ReactNode;
  dataPanelTitle?: string;
  diagramPanelTitle?: string;
  className?: string;
}

export const SplitViewShowcase: React.FC&lt;SplitViewShowcaseProps&gt; = ({
  title,
  description,
  dataPanel,
  diagramPanel,
  dataPanelTitle = &#39;Specification Data&#39;,
  diagramPanelTitle = &#39;Generated Diagram&#39;,
  className = &#39;&#39;,
}) =&gt; {
  return (
    &lt;div className={`w-full h-full ${className}`}&gt;
      {/* Header */}
      &lt;div className=&quot;mb-6&quot;&gt;
        &lt;h2 className=&quot;text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2&quot;&gt;{title}&lt;/h2&gt;
        {description &amp;&amp; &lt;p className=&quot;text-gray-600&quot;&gt;{description}&lt;/p&gt;}
      &lt;/div&gt;

      {/* Split View */}
      &lt;div className=&quot;grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6 h-[calc(100vh-200px)] min-h-[600px]&quot;&gt;
        {/* Data Panel */}
        &lt;Card className=&quot;flex flex-col&quot;&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-3&quot;&gt;
            &lt;h3 className=&quot;text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 flex items-center&quot;&gt;
              &lt;span className=&quot;inline-block w-3 h-3 bg-blue-500 rounded-full mr-2&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
              {dataPanelTitle}
            &lt;/h3&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;flex-1 overflow-auto p-4&quot;&gt;{dataPanel}&lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/Card&gt;

        {/* Diagram Panel */}
        &lt;Card className=&quot;flex flex-col&quot;&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-3&quot;&gt;
            &lt;h3 className=&quot;text-lg font-semibold text-gray-900 flex items-center&quot;&gt;
              &lt;span className=&quot;inline-block w-3 h-3 bg-green-500 rounded-full mr-2&quot;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
              {diagramPanelTitle}
            &lt;/h3&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;flex-1 overflow-auto p-4 bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;{diagramPanel}&lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/Card&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
};

export default SplitViewShowcase;

 */

📄 apps/api/src/handlers/types.ts
/**
 * Custom webhook handler types and interfaces
 */

// Handler execution context
export interface HandlerContext {
  projectId: string;
  config: HandlerConfig;
  logger: Logger;
  services: HandlerServices;
  metadata: HandlerMetadata;
}

// Handler configuration
export interface HandlerConfig {
  enabled: boolean;
  timeout: number; // milliseconds
  retries: number;
  environment: Record&lt;string, string&gt;;
  secrets: Record&lt;string, string&gt;; // Encrypted secrets
}

// Available services for handlers
export interface HandlerServices {
  events: EventService;
  db: SpecWorkbenchDB;
  http: HttpClient;
  notifications: NotificationService;
  git: GitService;
}

// Handler metadata
export interface HandlerMetadata {
  handlerPath: string;
  version: string;
  executionId: string;
  timestamp: string;
}

// Handler result
export interface HandlerResult {
  success: boolean;
  message: string;
  data?: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;;
  actions?: string[];
  errors?: HandlerError[];
  duration?: number;
}

// Handler error
export interface HandlerError {
  code: string;
  message: string;
  details?: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;;
  stack?: string;
}

// Enhanced webhook payload with parsed data
export interface EnhancedWebhookPayload extends WebhookPayload {
  parsed: {
    eventType: string;
    action?: string;
    author: {
      name: string;
      email?: string;
      username?: string;
    };
    repository: {
      name: string;
      fullName: string;
      owner: string;
      url: string;
      defaultBranch: string;
      isPrivate: boolean;
    };
    commits?: Array&lt;{
      sha: string;
      message: string;
      author: string;
      url: string;
      timestamp: string;
      added: string[];
      modified: string[];
      removed: string[];
    }&gt;;
    pullRequest?: {
      id: number;
      title: string;
      body: string;
      state: string;
      baseBranch: string;
      headBranch: string;
      url: string;
      merged: boolean;
      mergeable: boolean;
    };
    issue?: {
      id: number;
      title: string;
      body: string;
      state: string;
      labels: string[];
      assignees: string[];
      url: string;
    };
  };
}

// Handler function signature
export type WebhookHandler = (
  payload: EnhancedWebhookPayload,
  context: HandlerContext
) =&gt; Promise&lt;HandlerResult&gt;;

// Handler module interface
export interface HandlerModule {
  handler: WebhookHandler;
  config?: Partial&lt;HandlerConfig&gt;;
  metadata?: {
    name: string;
    description: string;
    version: string;
    author?: string;
    supportedEvents: string[];
    requiredPermissions: string[];
  };
}

// Logger interface for handlers
export interface Logger {
  info(message: string, meta?: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;): void;
  warn(message: string, meta?: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;): void;
  error(message: string, error?: Error, meta?: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;): void;
  debug(message: string, meta?: Record&lt;string, unknown&gt;): void;
}

// HTTP client interface
export interface HttpClient {
  get(url: string, options?: RequestOptions): Promise&lt;HttpResponse&gt;;
  post(url: string, data?: unknown, options?: RequestOptions): Promise&lt;HttpResponse&gt;;
  put(url: string, data?: unknown, options?: RequestOptions): Promise&lt;HttpResponse&gt;;
  delete(url: string, options?: RequestOptions): Promise&lt;HttpResponse&gt;;
}

export interface RequestOptions {
  headers?: Record&lt;string, string&gt;;
  timeout?: number;
  retries?: number;
}

export interface HttpResponse {
  status: number;
  statusText: string;
  data: unknown;
  headers: Record&lt;string, string&gt;;
}

// Notification service interface
export interface NotificationService {
  sendSlack(webhook: string, message: SlackMessage): Promise&lt;void&gt;;
  sendEmail(to: string, subject: string, body: string): Promise&lt;void&gt;;
  sendWebhook(url: string, payload: unknown): Promise&lt;void&gt;;
}

export interface SlackMessage {
  text?: string;
  blocks?: unknown[];
  channel?: string;
  username?: string;
  iconEmoji?: string;
}

// Git service interface
export interface GitService {
  cloneRepository(url: string, path: string): Promise&lt;void&gt;;
  getCommitDiff(sha: string): Promise&lt;FileDiff[]&gt;;
  getFileContent(path: string, ref?: string): Promise&lt;string&gt;;
  createBranch(name: string, from?: string): Promise&lt;void&gt;;
  createPullRequest(title: string, body: string, base: string, head: string): Promise&lt;unknown&gt;;
}

export interface FileDiff {
  path: string;
  status: &#39;added&#39; | &#39;modified&#39; | &#39;deleted&#39; | &#39;renamed&#39;;
  additions: number;
  deletions: number;
  patch?: string;
}

// Handler registry types
export interface RegisteredHandler {
  id: string;
  provider: &#39;github&#39; | &#39;gitlab&#39;;
  event: string;
  handlerPath: string;
  enabled: boolean;
  config: HandlerConfig;
  lastExecuted?: string;
  executionCount: number;
  errorCount: number;
  metadata: HandlerModule[&#39;metadata&#39;];
}

export interface HandlerCreationOptions {
  provider: &#39;github&#39; | &#39;gitlab&#39;;
  event: string;
  code: string;
  config?: Partial&lt;HandlerConfig&gt;;
  metadata?: {
    name: string;
    description: string;
    version?: string;
    author?: string;
  };
}

export interface HandlerExecution {
  id: string;
  handlerId: string;
  projectId: string;
  provider: &#39;github&#39; | &#39;gitlab&#39;;
  event: string;
  payload: EnhancedWebhookPayload;
  result: HandlerResult;
  startedAt: string;
  completedAt: string;
  duration: number;
}

// Configuration for handler discovery
export interface HandlerDiscoveryConfig {
  handlersDirectory: string;
  enableAutoReload: boolean;
  maxConcurrentExecutions: number;
  defaultTimeout: number;
  defaultRetries: number;
  sandboxEnabled: boolean;
  allowedModules: string[];
  enableMetrics: boolean;
}
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/charts/index.ts

export { Chart, type ChartData } from &#39;./Chart&#39;;
export { CuePlotViewer } from &#39;./CuePlotViewer&#39;;

 */

  },
};

📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/Layout/TopBar.stories.tsx
/**
 * TopBar Component Stories
 * Showcase of the enhanced TopBar with Graphite Design System
 */

import type { Meta, StoryObj } from &#39;@storybook/react&#39;;
import { TopBar } from &#39;./TopBar&#39;;

const meta = {
  title: &#39;Components/TopBar&#39;,
  component: TopBar,
  parameters: {
    layout: &#39;fullscreen&#39;,
    docs: {
      description: {
        component:
          &#39;Enhanced top navigation bar for the Spec Workbench application. Features project selector, connection status, validation state, and action buttons with professional graphite styling.&#39;,
      },
    },
  },
  tags: [&#39;autodocs&#39;],
} satisfies Meta&lt;typeof TopBar&gt;;

export default meta;
type Story = StoryObj&lt;typeof meta&gt;;

// Mock the required context providers
const mockContextValue = {
  state: {
    projects: [{ id: &#39;1&#39;, name: &#39;Sample Project&#39;, description: &#39;A sample project&#39; }],
    currentProjectId: &#39;1&#39;,
    fragments: [
      {
        id: &#39;1&#39;,
        path: &#39;api/routes.cue&#39;,
        content: &#39;package api&#39;,
        project_id: &#39;1&#39;,
        created_at: &#39;&#39;,
        updated_at: &#39;&#39;,
      },
      {
        id: &#39;2&#39;,
        path: &#39;schemas/user.cue&#39;,
        content: &#39;package schemas&#39;,
        project_id: &#39;1&#39;,
        created_at: &#39;&#39;,
        updated_at: &#39;&#39;,
      },
    ],
    unsavedChanges: new Set([&#39;1&#39;]),
    activeFragmentId: &#39;1&#39;,
    editorContent: {},
    loading: false,
    error: null,
    connectionStatus: {
      isConnected: true,
      reconnectAttempts: 0,
      lastSync: new Date().toISOString(),
    },
    validationState: {
      errors: [],
      warnings: [],
      isValidating: false,
      lastValidation: null,
      specHash: null,
    },
  },
  dispatch: () =&gt; {},
  setActiveFragment: () =&gt; {},
  setLoading: () =&gt; {},
  setError: () =&gt; {},
};

// Default state - connected and valid
export const Default: Story = {
  decorators: [
    Story =&gt; (
      &lt;div className=&quot;min-h-screen bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;
        &lt;Story /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    ),
  ],
};

// With unsaved changes
export const WithUnsavedChanges: Story = {
  decorators: [
    Story =&gt; (
      &lt;div className=&quot;min-h-screen bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;
        &lt;Story /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    ),
  ],
};

// Disconnected state
export const Disconnected: Story = {
  decorators: [
    Story =&gt; (
      &lt;div className=&quot;min-h-screen bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;
        &lt;Story /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    ),
  ],
};

// Validation errors

  decorators: [
    Story =&gt; (
      &lt;div className=&quot;min-h-screen bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;

      &lt;/div&gt;
    ),

};

    Story =&gt; (
      &lt;div className=&quot;min-h-screen bg-gray-50&quot;&gt;
        &lt;Story /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    ),
  ],
};

// Note: The TopBar component requires React context providers that aren&#39;t available in Storybook stories.
// In a real implementation, you would need to wrap these stories with mock providers or create a
// standalone version of the TopBar for Storybook that doesn&#39;t depend on context.
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/Handlers/HandlersErrorBoundary.tsx
/**
 * Error Boundary for Handlers Components
 * Provides graceful error handling and recovery
 */

import React, { Component, ReactNode } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { AlertTriangle, RefreshCw, Home } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;
import { Button, Card } from &#39;../../design-system&#39;;

interface Props {
  children: ReactNode;
  fallbackTitle?: string;
  fallbackMessage?: string;
  onReset?: () =&gt; void;
}

interface State {
  hasError: boolean;
  error: Error | null;
  errorInfo: React.ErrorInfo | null;
}

export class HandlersErrorBoundary extends Component&lt;Props, State&gt; {
  constructor(props: Props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      hasError: false,
      error: null,
      errorInfo: null,
    };
  }

  static getDerivedStateFromError(error: Error): Partial&lt;State&gt; {
    // Update state so the next render will show the fallback UI
    return { hasError: true, error };
  }

  componentDidCatch(error: Error, errorInfo: React.ErrorInfo) {
    // Log the error for debugging
    console.error(&#39;HandlersErrorBoundary caught an error:&#39;, error, errorInfo);

    this.setState({
      error,
      errorInfo,
    });
  }

  handleReset = () =&gt; {
    this.setState({
      hasError: false,
      error: null,
      errorInfo: null,
    });

    if (this.props.onReset) {
      this.props.onReset();
    }
  };

  render() {
    if (this.state.hasError) {
      const {
        fallbackTitle = &#39;Something went wrong with handlers&#39;,
        fallbackMessage = &#39;An error occurred while loading the webhook handlers interface. Please try refreshing or contact support if the issue persists.&#39;,
      } = this.props;

      return (
        &lt;div className=&quot;h-full flex items-center justify-center p-6&quot;&gt;
          &lt;Card className=&quot;max-w-md w-full p-8 text-center&quot;&gt;
            &lt;div className=&quot;mb-6&quot;&gt;
              &lt;div className=&quot;mx-auto w-16 h-16 bg-red-100 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mb-4&quot;&gt;
                &lt;AlertTriangle className=&quot;w-8 h-8 text-red-600&quot; /&gt;
              &lt;/div&gt;

              &lt;h2 className=&quot;text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-2&quot;&gt;{fallbackTitle}&lt;/h2&gt;

              &lt;p className=&quot;text-gray-600 text-sm mb-6&quot;&gt;{fallbackMessage}&lt;/p&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;

            &lt;div className=&quot;space-y-3&quot;&gt;
              &lt;Button
                onClick={this.handleReset}
                className=&quot;w-full&quot;
                leftIcon={&lt;RefreshCw className=&quot;w-4 h-4&quot; /&gt;}
              &gt;
                Try Again
              &lt;/Button&gt;

              &lt;Button
                variant=&quot;secondary&quot;
                onClick={() =&gt; window.location.reload()}
                className=&quot;w-full&quot;
                leftIcon={&lt;Home className=&quot;w-4 h-4&quot; /&gt;}
              &gt;
                Reload Page
              &lt;/Button&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;

            {/* Error details for debugging (only in development) */}
            {process.env.NODE_ENV === &#39;development&#39; &amp;&amp; this.state.error &amp;&amp; (
              &lt;details className=&quot;mt-6 text-left&quot;&gt;
                &lt;summary className=&quot;cursor-pointer text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 text-sm mb-2&quot;&gt;
                  Error Details (Development)
                &lt;/summary&gt;
                &lt;div className=&quot;bg-gray-100 p-3 rounded text-xs font-mono overflow-auto max-h-32&quot;&gt;
                  &lt;div className=&quot;mb-2&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;strong&gt;Error:&lt;/strong&gt; {this.state.error.message}
                  &lt;/div&gt;
                  &lt;div className=&quot;mb-2&quot;&gt;
                    &lt;strong&gt;Stack:&lt;/strong&gt;
                    &lt;pre className=&quot;whitespace-pre-wrap text-xs&quot;&gt;{this.state.error.stack}&lt;/pre&gt;
                  &lt;/div&gt;
                  {this.state.errorInfo &amp;&amp; (
                    &lt;div&gt;
                      &lt;strong&gt;Component Stack:&lt;/strong&gt;
                      &lt;pre className=&quot;whitespace-pre-wrap text-xs&quot;&gt;
                        {this.state.errorInfo.componentStack}
                      &lt;/pre&gt;
                    &lt;/div&gt;
                  )}
                &lt;/div&gt;
              &lt;/details&gt;
            )}
          &lt;/Card&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      );
    }

    return this.props.children;
  }
}

export default HandlersErrorBoundary;
📄 scripts/local-ci.sh
#!/usr/bin/env bash
# Ensure the script aborts on errors, unset variables, or failed pipelines
set -euo pipefail

ROOT_DIR=&quot;$(cd &quot;$(dirname &quot;${BASH_SOURCE[0]}&quot;)/..&quot; &amp;&amp; pwd)&quot;
cd &quot;${ROOT_DIR}&quot;

TOTAL_STEPS=6
STEP=1

print_header() {
  printf &#39;\n========================================\n&#39;
  printf &#39;%s\n&#39; &quot;$1&quot;
  printf &#39;========================================\n&#39;
}

run_step() {
  local title=$1
  shift
  local cmd=(&quot;$@&quot;)

  printf &#39;\n[%d/%d] %s\n&#39; &quot;${STEP}&quot; &quot;${TOTAL_STEPS}&quot; &quot;${title}&quot;
  printf &#39;----------------------------------------\n&#39;
  if &quot;${cmd[@]}&quot;; then
    printf &#39;✅ %s\n&#39; &quot;${title}&quot;
  else
    local status=$?
    printf &#39;❌ %s (exit code %d)\n&#39; &quot;${title}&quot; &quot;${status}&quot;
    exit &quot;${status}&quot;
  fi
  STEP=$((STEP + 1))
}

print_header &quot;Arbiter Local CI&quot;

run_step &quot;Install dependencies&quot; bun install --frozen-lockfile
run_step &quot;Check formatting &amp; linting&quot; bun run check:ci
run_step &quot;Type check (TS project references)&quot; bun run typecheck
run_step &quot;Run unit and integration tests&quot; bun run test
run_step &quot;Build workspaces&quot; bun run build
run_step &quot;Audit dependencies&quot; bun audit

printf &#39;\nAll checks passed ✅\n&#39;
📄 apps/web/frontend/.storybook/decorators.tsx
import React from &#39;react&#39;;
import type { Decorator } from &#39;@storybook/react&#39;;

/**
 * Design System Context Decorator
 * Applies theme classes and design system context to all stories
 */
export const DesignSystemDecorator: Decorator = (Story, context) =&gt; {
  // Apply theme class based on toolbar selection
  const theme = context.globals.designSystem || &#39;default&#39;;
  const colorScheme = context.globals.colorScheme || &#39;light&#39;;

  return (
    &lt;div
      className={`storybook-decorator ${theme} ${colorScheme}`}
      style={{
        fontFamily: &#39;&quot;Inter&quot;, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, sans-serif&#39;,
        colorScheme: colorScheme,
        minHeight: &#39;100vh&#39;,
        backgroundColor: colorScheme === &#39;dark&#39; ? &#39;#0f172a&#39; : &#39;#ffffff&#39;,
        color: colorScheme === &#39;dark&#39; ? &#39;#f8fafc&#39; : &#39;#0f172a&#39;,
      }}
    &gt;
      &lt;Story /&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
};
📄 apps/web/frontend/tsconfig.json

  &quot;files&quot;: [],
  &quot;references&quot;: [
    { &quot;path&quot;: &quot;./tsconfig.app.json&quot; },
    { &quot;path&quot;: &quot;./tsconfig.node.json&quot; }
  ]
}

      &quot;types&quot;: &quot;./dist/index.d.ts&quot;,
      &quot;import&quot;: &quot;./dist/index.js&quot;
    }

  &quot;scripts&quot;: {
    &quot;build&quot;: &quot;tsc&quot;,
    &quot;dev&quot;: &quot;tsc --watch&quot;,

    &quot;clean&quot;: &quot;rm -rf dist&quot;

📄 biome.json
{
  &quot;$schema&quot;: &quot;https://biomejs.dev/schemas/1.9.4/schema.json&quot;,
  &quot;linter&quot;: {
    &quot;enabled&quot;: true,
    &quot;rules&quot;: {
      &quot;recommended&quot;: false,
      &quot;suspicious&quot;: {
        &quot;noExplicitAny&quot;: &quot;off&quot;,
        &quot;noArrayIndexKey&quot;: &quot;off&quot;
      },
      &quot;style&quot;: {
        &quot;noNonNullAssertion&quot;: &quot;off&quot;,
        &quot;useTemplate&quot;: &quot;off&quot;
      },
      &quot;complexity&quot;: {
        &quot;noForEach&quot;: &quot;off&quot;,
        &quot;noStaticOnlyClass&quot;: &quot;off&quot;
      },
      &quot;correctness&quot;: {
        &quot;useExhaustiveDependencies&quot;: &quot;off&quot;
      }
    }
  },

    &quot;enabled&quot;: true,

    &quot;indentStyle&quot;: &quot;space&quot;,

      &quot;bracketSpacing&quot;: true,
      &quot;bracketSameLine&quot;: false,
      &quot;quoteStyle&quot;: &quot;double&quot;
    },
    &quot;globals&quot;: [
      &quot;describe&quot;,
      &quot;it&quot;,
      &quot;expect&quot;,
      &quot;beforeAll&quot;,
      &quot;afterAll&quot;,
      &quot;beforeEach&quot;,
      &quot;afterEach&quot;,

    ]
  },

    &quot;include&quot;: [
      &quot;apps/**/*.ts&quot;,

    ],

📄 demo-project/package.json
{
  &quot;name&quot;: &quot;demo-project&quot;,
  &quot;private&quot;: true,
  &quot;version&quot;: &quot;0.0.0&quot;,
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;module&quot;,
  &quot;description&quot;: &quot;Application goals will be defined here&quot;,
  &quot;scripts&quot;: {
    &quot;dev&quot;: &quot;vite&quot;,
    &quot;build&quot;: &quot;tsc &amp;&amp; vite build&quot;,
    &quot;preview&quot;: &quot;vite preview&quot;,
    &quot;test&quot;: &quot;vitest&quot;,
    &quot;test:ui&quot;: &quot;vitest --ui&quot;,
    &quot;lint&quot;: &quot;eslint src --ext ts,tsx --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0&quot;,
    &quot;type-check&quot;: &quot;tsc --noEmit&quot;
  },
  &quot;dependencies&quot;: {},
  &quot;devDependencies&quot;: {},
  &quot;engines&quot;: {
    &quot;node&quot;: &quot;&gt;=18.0.0&quot;
  }
}
📄 apps/api/tsconfig.json

  &quot;extends&quot;: &quot;../../tsconfig.json&quot;,
  &quot;compilerOptions&quot;: {
    &quot;outDir&quot;: &quot;./dist&quot;,
    &quot;rootDir&quot;: &quot;./src&quot;,
    &quot;composite&quot;: true,
    &quot;noEmit&quot;: false,
    &quot;baseUrl&quot;: &quot;.&quot;,
    &quot;paths&quot;: {
      &quot;@arbiter/shared&quot;: [
        &quot;../../packages/shared/src/index.ts&quot;
      ],
      &quot;@arbiter/shared/*&quot;: [
        &quot;../../packages/shared/src/*&quot;
      ],
      &quot;@arbiter/core&quot;: [
        &quot;../../packages/arbiter-core/src/index.ts&quot;
      ],
      &quot;@arbiter/core/*&quot;: [
        &quot;../../packages/arbiter-core/src/*&quot;
      ],
      &quot;@arbiter/api-types&quot;: [
        &quot;../../packages/api-types/src/index.ts&quot;
      ],
      &quot;@arbiter/api-types/*&quot;: [
        &quot;../../packages/api-types/src/*&quot;
      ]
    }
  },
  &quot;references&quot;: [
    {
      &quot;path&quot;: &quot;../../packages/shared&quot;
    },
    {
      &quot;path&quot;: &quot;../../packages/arbiter-core&quot;
    },
    {
      &quot;path&quot;: &quot;../../packages/api-types&quot;
    }
  ],
  &quot;include&quot;: [
    &quot;src/**/*&quot;
  ],
  &quot;exclude&quot;: [
    &quot;node_modules&quot;,
    &quot;dist&quot;,
    &quot;**/*.test.ts&quot;
  ]
}
📄 docker-compose.yml
version: &#39;3.8&#39;

services:
  # Spec Workbench Backend
  spec-workbench:
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: Dockerfile
    ports:
      - &#39;5050:5050&#39;
    environment:
      - NODE_ENV=development
      - PORT=5050
      - NATS_URL=nats://nats:4222
      - DATABASE_PATH=/app/data/spec_workbench.db
    volumes:
      - ./data:/app/data
      - ./examples:/app/examples:ro
    depends_on:
      - nats
    networks:
      - spec-workbench

  # NATS Server for external agent communication
  nats:
    image: nats:2.10-alpine
    ports:
      - &#39;4222:4222&#39; # Client connections
      - &#39;6222:6222&#39; # Cluster connections
      - &#39;8222:8222&#39; # HTTP monitoring
    command:
      - &#39;--cluster_name=spec-workbench&#39;
      - &#39;--cluster=nats://0.0.0.0:6222&#39;
      - &#39;--http_port=8222&#39;
      - &#39;--port=4222&#39;
      - &#39;--server_name=nats-server&#39;
    networks:
      - spec-workbench

  # NATS Monitoring Dashboard (optional)
  nats-surveyor:
    image: natsio/nats-surveyor:latest
    ports:
      - &#39;7777:7777&#39;
    command:
      - &#39;-s&#39;
      - &#39;http://nats:8222&#39;
      - &#39;-p&#39;
      - &#39;7777&#39;
    depends_on:
      - nats
    networks:
      - spec-workbench

  # Example External Agent
  example-agent:
    build:
      context: .
      dockerfile: Dockerfile.agent
    environment:
      - NATS_URL=nats://nats:4222
      - AGENT_NAME=ExampleAnalysisAgent
    depends_on:
      - nats
      - spec-workbench
    networks:
      - spec-workbench
    profiles:
      - agents # Only start with --profile agents

networks:
  spec-workbench:
    driver: bridge

volumes:
  spec-data:
    driver: local

    &quot;module&quot;: &quot;ESNext&quot;,
    &quot;skipLibCheck&quot;: true,
    &quot;moduleResolution&quot;: &quot;bundler&quot;,
    &quot;allowImportingTsExtensions&quot;: true,
    &quot;resolveJsonModule&quot;: true,
    &quot;isolatedModules&quot;: true,
    &quot;noEmit&quot;: true,
    &quot;jsx&quot;: &quot;react-jsx&quot;,
    &quot;strict&quot;: true,
    &quot;noUnusedLocals&quot;: true,
    &quot;noUnusedParameters&quot;: true,
    &quot;noFallthroughCasesInSwitch&quot;: true
  },
  &quot;include&quot;: [&quot;src&quot;],
  &quot;references&quot;: [

      &quot;path&quot;: &quot;./tsconfig.node.json&quot;
    }
  ]

#root {
  max-width: 1280px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 2rem;
  text-align: center;
}

.logo {
  height: 6em;
  padding: 1.5em;
  will-change: filter;
  transition: filter 300ms;
}
.logo:hover {
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 2em #646cffaa);
}
.logo.react:hover {
  filter: drop-shadow(0 0 2em #61dafbaa);
}

@keyframes logo-spin {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0deg);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

@media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference) {
  a:nth-of-type(2) .logo {
    animation: logo-spin infinite 20s linear;
  }
}

  padding: 2em;
}

import React from &#39;react&#39;;
import ReactDOM from &#39;react-dom/client&#39;;
import App from &#39;./App&#39;;
import &#39;./index.css&#39;;

ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById(&#39;root&#39;)!).render(
  &lt;React.StrictMode&gt;
    &lt;App /&gt;
  &lt;/React.StrictMode&gt;
