          &lt;AppContent /&gt;
          &lt;ToastContainer
            position=&quot;top-right&quot;
            autoClose={3000}
            hideProgressBar={false}
            newestOnTop
            closeOnClick
            rtl={false}
            pauseOnFocusLoss
            draggable
            pauseOnHover
            theme=&quot;light&quot;
          /&gt;
        &lt;/ProjectProvider&gt;
      &lt;/QueryProvider&gt;
    &lt;/ErrorBoundary&gt;
  );
}

export default App;
📄 apps/api/src/tests/integration/nats.test.ts
/**
 * NATS integration tests
 */
import { type NatsConnection, connect } from &#39;nats&#39;;
import { NatsService } from &#39;../../nats.ts&#39;;
import type { Event, NatsConfig } from &#39;../../types.ts&#39;;

describe(&#39;NATS Integration&#39;, () =&gt; {
  let natsService: NatsService;
  let testConnection: NatsConnection | null = null;
  let natsAvailable = false;
  const TEST_NATS_URL = &#39;nats://localhost:4222&#39;;

  beforeAll(async () =&gt; {
    // Skip tests if no NATS server available
    try {
      testConnection = await connect({
        servers: [TEST_NATS_URL],
        timeout: 2000,
      });
      natsAvailable = true;
    } catch (_error) {
      console.warn(&#39;NATS server not available, skipping NATS tests&#39;);
      return;
    }
  });

  afterAll(async () =&gt; {
    if (testConnection) {
      await testConnection.close();
    }
    if (natsService) {
      await natsService.cleanup();
    }
  });

  describe(&#39;NatsService&#39;, () =&gt; {
    it(&#39;should initialize with NATS disabled by default&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const service = new NatsService();
      const stats = service.getStats();

      expect(stats.enabled).toBe(false);
      expect(stats.connected).toBe(false);
    });

    it(&#39;should enable NATS when URL is provided&#39;, () =&gt; {
      if (!natsAvailable) return;

      const config: NatsConfig = {
        url: TEST_NATS_URL,
        enabled: true,
        reconnectTimeWait: 1000,
        maxReconnectAttempts: 3,
        topicPrefix: &#39;test-spec&#39;,
      };

      natsService = new NatsService(config);
      const stats = natsService.getStats();

      expect(stats.enabled).toBe(true);
      expect(stats.config.topicPrefix).toBe(&#39;test-spec&#39;);
    });

    it(&#39;should publish events to NATS topics&#39;, async () =&gt; {
      if (!natsAvailable || !testConnection) return;

      const config: NatsConfig = {
        url: TEST_NATS_URL,
        enabled: true,
        reconnectTimeWait: 1000,
        maxReconnectAttempts: 3,
        topicPrefix: &#39;test-spec&#39;,
      };

      natsService = new NatsService(config);

      // Give service time to connect
      await new Promise(resolve =&gt; setTimeout(resolve, 1000));

      // Subscribe to test topic
      const subscription = testConnection.subscribe(&#39;test-spec.project123.fragment.updated&#39;);
      const messagePromise = new Promise(resolve =&gt; {
        subscription.then(async sub =&gt; {
          for await (const message of sub) {
            const event = JSON.parse(message.data.toString());
            resolve(event);
            break;
          }
        });
      });

      // Publish test event
      const testEvent: Omit&lt;Event, &#39;id&#39; | &#39;created_at&#39;&gt; = {
        project_id: &#39;project123&#39;,
        event_type: &#39;fragment_updated&#39;,
        data: {
          path: &#39;test.cue&#39;,
          content: &#39;package test\n\nvalue: 42&#39;,
        },
      };

      await natsService.publishEvent(&#39;project123&#39;, testEvent, &#39;testhash123&#39;);

      // Wait for message
      const receivedEvent = (await Promise.race([
        messagePromise,
        new Promise((_, reject) =&gt; setTimeout(() =&gt; reject(new Error(&#39;Timeout&#39;)), 3000)),
      ])) as any;

      expect(receivedEvent.topic).toBe(&#39;test-spec.project123.fragment.updated&#39;);
      expect(receivedEvent.projectId).toBe(&#39;project123&#39;);
      expect(receivedEvent.event.event_type).toBe(&#39;fragment_updated&#39;);
      expect(receivedEvent.event.project_id).toBe(&#39;project123&#39;);
      expect(receivedEvent.metadata.specHash).toBe(&#39;testhash123&#39;);
      expect(receivedEvent.metadata.sequence).toBeGreaterThan(0);
    });

    it(&#39;should handle NATS unavailability gracefully&#39;, async () =&gt; {
      const config: NatsConfig = {
        url: &#39;nats://nonexistent:4222&#39;,
        enabled: true,
        reconnectTimeWait: 100,
        maxReconnectAttempts: 1,
        topicPrefix: &#39;test-spec&#39;,
      };

      const service = new NatsService(config);

      // Publishing should not throw even if NATS is unavailable
      const testEvent: Omit&lt;Event, &#39;id&#39; | &#39;created_at&#39;&gt; = {
        project_id: &#39;project123&#39;,
        event_type: &#39;fragment_updated&#39;,
        data: { test: true },
      };

      await expect(service.publishEvent(&#39;project123&#39;, testEvent)).resolves.toBeUndefined();

      const stats = service.getStats();
      expect(stats.enabled).toBe(true);
      expect(stats.connected).toBe(false);

      await service.cleanup();
    });
  });

  describe(&#39;Event Topic Mapping&#39;, () =&gt; {
    it(&#39;should map fragment events correctly&#39;, () =&gt; {
      if (!natsAvailable) return;

      const config: NatsConfig = {
        url: TEST_NATS_URL,
        enabled: true,
        reconnectTimeWait: 1000,
        maxReconnectAttempts: 3,
        topicPrefix: &#39;spec&#39;,
      };

      const service = new NatsService(config);

      // Test topic mapping via reflection (accessing private method for testing)
      const getTopicSuffix = (service as any).getTopicSuffix.bind(service);

      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;fragment_created&#39;)).toBe(&#39;fragment&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;fragment_updated&#39;)).toBe(&#39;fragment&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;fragment_deleted&#39;)).toBe(&#39;fragment&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;validation_started&#39;)).toBe(&#39;validation&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;validation_completed&#39;)).toBe(&#39;validation&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;validation_failed&#39;)).toBe(&#39;validation&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;version_frozen&#39;)).toBe(&#39;version&#39;);
      expect(getTopicSuffix(&#39;unknown_event&#39;)).toBe(&#39;general&#39;);
    });
  });
});
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/design-system/components/NavItem.tsx
/**
 * NavItem Component - Design System
 * Flexible navigation item for various navigation contexts
 * Designed for developer tools with sophisticated graphite theme
 */

import React, { forwardRef, type ReactNode } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { clsx } from &#39;clsx&#39;;
import { ExternalLink, ChevronRight } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;
import { cn } from &#39;../variants&#39;;

export interface NavItemProps {
  /** Item content/label */
  children: ReactNode;

  /** Item href */
  href?: string;

  /** Whether the item is currently active */
  active?: boolean;

  /** Whether the item is disabled */
  disabled?: boolean;

  /** Icon to display before the label */
  icon?: ReactNode;

  /** Icon to display after the label */
  endIcon?: ReactNode;

  /** Badge or secondary content */
  badge?: string | number | ReactNode;

  /** Visual variant */
  variant?: &#39;default&#39; | &#39;subtle&#39; | &#39;ghost&#39;;

  /** Size variant */
  size?: &#39;sm&#39; | &#39;md&#39; | &#39;lg&#39;;

  /** Whether this is an external link */
  external?: boolean;

  /** Custom className */
  className?: string;

  /** Click handler */
  onClick?: (event: React.MouseEvent&lt;HTMLButtonElement | HTMLAnchorElement&gt;) =&gt; void;

  /** Whether to show hover effects */
  interactive?: boolean;

  /** Keyboard shortcut hint */
  shortcut?: string;
}

const variantClasses = {
  default: {
    base: &#39;text-graphite-700 hover:text-graphite-900 hover:bg-graphite-100&#39;,
    active: &#39;bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border-r-2 border-blue-500&#39;,
    disabled: &#39;text-graphite-400 cursor-not-allowed&#39;,
  },
  subtle: {
    base: &#39;text-graphite-600 hover:text-graphite-800 hover:bg-graphite-50&#39;,
    active: &#39;bg-graphite-100 text-graphite-900 font-medium&#39;,
    disabled: &#39;text-graphite-400 cursor-not-allowed&#39;,
  },
  ghost: {
    base: &#39;text-graphite-600 hover:text-graphite-900&#39;,
    active: &#39;text-blue-600 font-medium&#39;,
    disabled: &#39;text-graphite-400 cursor-not-allowed&#39;,
  },
} as const;

const sizeClasses = {
  sm: {
    container: &#39;px-2 py-1.5 text-sm&#39;,
    icon: &#39;h-3.5 w-3.5&#39;,
    badge: &#39;px-1.5 py-0.5 text-xs&#39;,
    shortcut: &#39;text-xs&#39;,
  },
  md: {
    container: &#39;px-3 py-2 text-sm&#39;,
    icon: &#39;h-4 w-4&#39;,
    badge: &#39;px-2 py-1 text-xs&#39;,
    shortcut: &#39;text-xs&#39;,
  },
  lg: {
    container: &#39;px-4 py-3 text-base&#39;,
    icon: &#39;h-5 w-5&#39;,
    badge: &#39;px-2.5 py-1 text-sm&#39;,
    shortcut: &#39;text-sm&#39;,
  },
} as const;

export const NavItem = forwardRef&lt;HTMLButtonElement | HTMLAnchorElement, NavItemProps&gt;(
  (
    {
      children,
      href,
      active = false,
      disabled = false,
      icon,
      endIcon,
      badge,
      variant = &#39;default&#39;,
      size = &#39;md&#39;,
      external = false,
      className,
      onClick,
      interactive = true,
      shortcut,
      ...props
    },
    ref
  ) =&gt; {
    const variants = variantClasses[variant];
    const sizes = sizeClasses[size];

    const baseClasses = cn(
      &#39;flex items-center justify-between w-full rounded-md font-medium transition-all duration-150&#39;,
      &#39;focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-offset-1&#39;,
      sizes.container,

      // State styling
      disabled ? variants.disabled : active ? variants.active : interactive &amp;&amp; variants.base,

      className
    );

    const content = (
      &lt;&gt;
        {/* Left content */}
        &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center gap-2 min-w-0 flex-1&quot;&gt;
          {/* Icon */}
          {icon &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;span
              className={cn(
                &#39;flex-shrink-0&#39;,
                sizes.icon,
                active ? &#39;text-blue-600&#39; : &#39;text-graphite-500&#39;
              )}
            &gt;
              {icon}
            &lt;/span&gt;
          )}

          {/* Label */}
          &lt;span className=&quot;truncate&quot;&gt;{children}&lt;/span&gt;

          {/* External link indicator */}
          {external &amp;&amp; href &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;ExternalLink className={cn(&#39;flex-shrink-0&#39;, sizes.icon, &#39;text-graphite-400&#39;)} /&gt;
          )}
        &lt;/div&gt;

        {/* Right content */}
        &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center gap-2 flex-shrink-0&quot;&gt;
          {/* Badge */}
          {badge &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;span
              className={cn(
                &#39;inline-flex items-center justify-center font-medium rounded-full&#39;,
                sizes.badge,
                active ? &#39;bg-blue-100 text-blue-700&#39; : &#39;bg-graphite-100 text-graphite-600&#39;
              )}
            &gt;
              {badge}
            &lt;/span&gt;
          )}

          {/* Keyboard shortcut */}
          {shortcut &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;kbd
              className={cn(
                &#39;inline-flex items-center font-mono font-medium rounded border bg-graphite-50 px-1.5 py-0.5&#39;,
                sizes.shortcut,
                &#39;text-graphite-500 border-graphite-200&#39;
              )}
            &gt;
              {shortcut}
            &lt;/kbd&gt;
          )}

          {/* End icon */}
          {endIcon &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;span className={cn(&#39;flex-shrink-0&#39;, sizes.icon, &#39;text-graphite-400&#39;)}&gt;{endIcon}&lt;/span&gt;
          )}
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/&gt;
    );

    // Render as link if href is provided
    if (href &amp;&amp; !disabled) {
      return (
        &lt;a
          ref={ref as React.Ref&lt;HTMLAnchorElement&gt;}
          href={href}
          className={baseClasses}
          onClick={onClick as React.MouseEventHandler&lt;HTMLAnchorElement&gt;}
          target={external ? &#39;_blank&#39; : undefined}
          rel={external ? &#39;noopener noreferrer&#39; : undefined}
          {...(props as React.AnchorHTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLAnchorElement&gt;)}
        &gt;
          {content}
        &lt;/a&gt;
      );
    }

    // Render as button otherwise
    return (
      &lt;button
        ref={ref as React.Ref&lt;HTMLButtonElement&gt;}
        type=&quot;button&quot;
        className={baseClasses}
        onClick={onClick as React.MouseEventHandler&lt;HTMLButtonElement&gt;}
        disabled={disabled}
        {...(props as React.ButtonHTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLButtonElement&gt;)}
      &gt;
        {content}
      &lt;/button&gt;
    );
  }
);

NavItem.displayName = &#39;NavItem&#39;;

// Group component for organizing navigation items
export interface NavGroupProps {
  /** Group title */
  title?: string;

  /** Group items */
  children: ReactNode;

  /** Whether the group is collapsible */
  collapsible?: boolean;

  /** Whether the group is initially collapsed */
  defaultCollapsed?: boolean;

  /** Custom className */
  className?: string;
}

export function NavGroup({
  title,
  children,
  collapsible = false,
  defaultCollapsed = false,
  className,
}: NavGroupProps) {
  const [collapsed, setCollapsed] = React.useState(defaultCollapsed);

  return (
    &lt;div className={cn(&#39;space-y-1&#39;, className)}&gt;
      {title &amp;&amp; (
        &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center justify-between&quot;&gt;
          {collapsible ? (
            &lt;button
              type=&quot;button&quot;
              className=&quot;flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 text-xs font-semibold text-graphite-500 uppercase tracking-wide hover:text-graphite-700 transition-colors&quot;
              onClick={() =&gt; setCollapsed(!collapsed)}
            &gt;
              &lt;ChevronRight
                className={cn(&#39;h-3 w-3 transition-transform&#39;, !collapsed &amp;&amp; &#39;rotate-90&#39;)}
              /&gt;
              {title}
            &lt;/button&gt;
          ) : (
            &lt;h3 className=&quot;px-3 py-2 text-xs font-semibold text-graphite-500 uppercase tracking-wide&quot;&gt;
              {title}
            &lt;/h3&gt;
          )}
        &lt;/div&gt;
      )}

      {(!collapsible || !collapsed) &amp;&amp; &lt;div className=&quot;space-y-1&quot;&gt;{children}&lt;/div&gt;}
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
}

export default NavItem;
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/design-system/components/Breadcrumbs.tsx
/**
 * Breadcrumbs Component - Design System
 * Professional breadcrumb navigation with elegant separators and hover states
 * Designed for developer tools with sophisticated graphite theme
 */

import React, { type ReactNode } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { clsx } from &#39;clsx&#39;;
import { ChevronRight, Home, Folder, File, MoreHorizontal } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;
import { cn } from &#39;../variants&#39;;

export interface BreadcrumbItem {
  id: string;
  label: string;
  href?: string;
  icon?: ReactNode;
  current?: boolean;
  onClick?: () =&gt; void;
}

export interface BreadcrumbsProps {
  /** Breadcrumb items */
  items: BreadcrumbItem[];

  /** Separator between items */
  separator?: &#39;chevron&#39; | &#39;slash&#39; | &#39;dot&#39; | ReactNode;

  /** Maximum number of items to show before collapsing */
  maxItems?: number;

  /** Size variant */
  size?: &#39;sm&#39; | &#39;md&#39; | &#39;lg&#39;;

  /** Whether to show home icon for first item */
  showHomeIcon?: boolean;

  /** Custom className */
  className?: string;

  /** Callback when an item is clicked */
  onItemClick?: (item: BreadcrumbItem) =&gt; void;
}

const separators = {
  chevron: &lt;ChevronRight className=&quot;h-4 w-4 text-graphite-400&quot; /&gt;,
  slash: &lt;span className=&quot;text-graphite-400 font-normal&quot;&gt;/&lt;/span&gt;,
  dot: &lt;span className=&quot;text-graphite-400&quot;&gt;•&lt;/span&gt;,
} as const;

const sizeClasses = {
  sm: {
    container: &#39;text-xs&#39;,
    item: &#39;px-2 py-1&#39;,
    icon: &#39;h-3 w-3&#39;,
  },
  md: {
    container: &#39;text-sm&#39;,
    item: &#39;px-2.5 py-1.5&#39;,
    icon: &#39;h-4 w-4&#39;,
  },
  lg: {
    container: &#39;text-base&#39;,
    item: &#39;px-3 py-2&#39;,
    icon: &#39;h-5 w-5&#39;,
  },
} as const;

function BreadcrumbItem({
  item,
  size = &#39;md&#39;,
  onItemClick,
  showIcon = false,
}: {
  item: BreadcrumbItem;
  size?: &#39;sm&#39; | &#39;md&#39; | &#39;lg&#39;;
  onItemClick?: (item: BreadcrumbItem) =&gt; void;
  showIcon?: boolean;
}) {
  const sizes = sizeClasses[size];
  const isClickable = item.href || item.onClick || onItemClick;
  const isCurrent = item.current;

  const handleClick = () =&gt; {
    if (item.onClick) {
      item.onClick();
    }
    onItemClick?.(item);
  };

  const content = (
    &lt;span
      className={cn(
        &#39;inline-flex items-center gap-1.5 rounded-md transition-colors duration-150&#39;,
        sizes.item,

        // Current item styling
        isCurrent &amp;&amp; &#39;text-graphite-900 font-semibold&#39;,

        // Clickable item styling
        isClickable &amp;&amp;
          !isCurrent &amp;&amp; [
            &#39;text-graphite-600 hover:text-graphite-900 hover:bg-graphite-50 cursor-pointer&#39;,
            &#39;focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-offset-1&#39;,
          ],

        // Non-clickable item styling
        !isClickable &amp;&amp; !isCurrent &amp;&amp; &#39;text-graphite-600&#39;
      )}
    &gt;
      {/* Icon */}
      {(showIcon || item.icon) &amp;&amp; (
        &lt;span
          className={cn(
            &#39;flex-shrink-0&#39;,
            sizes.icon,
            isCurrent ? &#39;text-graphite-700&#39; : &#39;text-graphite-500&#39;
          )}
        &gt;
          {item.icon || &lt;Folder className={sizes.icon} /&gt;}
        &lt;/span&gt;
      )}

      &lt;span className=&quot;truncate&quot;&gt;{item.label}&lt;/span&gt;
    &lt;/span&gt;
  );

  if (isClickable) {
    return (
      &lt;button
        type=&quot;button&quot;
        onClick={handleClick}
        className=&quot;inline-flex items-center&quot;
        aria-current={isCurrent ? &#39;page&#39; : undefined}
      &gt;
        {content}
      &lt;/button&gt;
    );
  }

  return (
    &lt;span className=&quot;inline-flex items-center&quot; aria-current={isCurrent ? &#39;page&#39; : undefined}&gt;
      {content}
    &lt;/span&gt;
  );
}

function CollapsedItems({
  items,
  size = &#39;md&#39;,
  onItemClick,
}: {
  items: BreadcrumbItem[];
  size?: &#39;sm&#39; | &#39;md&#39; | &#39;lg&#39;;
  onItemClick?: (item: BreadcrumbItem) =&gt; void;
}) {
  const [expanded, setExpanded] = React.useState(false);
  const sizes = sizeClasses[size];

  if (expanded) {
    return (
      &lt;&gt;
        {items.map((item, index) =&gt; (
          &lt;React.Fragment key={item.id}&gt;
            &lt;BreadcrumbItem item={item} size={size} onItemClick={onItemClick} /&gt;
            {index &lt; items.length - 1 &amp;&amp; (
              &lt;span className=&quot;flex-shrink-0 mx-1&quot;&gt;{separators.chevron}&lt;/span&gt;
            )}
          &lt;/React.Fragment&gt;
        ))}
      &lt;/&gt;
    );
  }

  return (
    &lt;button
      type=&quot;button&quot;
      onClick={() =&gt; setExpanded(true)}
      className={cn(
        &#39;inline-flex items-center gap-1 rounded-md transition-colors duration-150&#39;,
        sizes.item,
        &#39;text-graphite-600 hover:text-graphite-900 hover:bg-graphite-50&#39;,
        &#39;focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-offset-1&#39;
      )}
      aria-label={`Show ${items.length} hidden items`}
    &gt;
      &lt;MoreHorizontal className={sizes.icon} /&gt;
    &lt;/button&gt;
  );
}

export function Breadcrumbs({
  items,
  separator = &#39;chevron&#39;,
  maxItems,
  size = &#39;md&#39;,
  showHomeIcon = false,
  className,
  onItemClick,
}: BreadcrumbsProps) {
  const sizes = sizeClasses[size];

  // Handle collapsing items if maxItems is set
  let displayItems = items;
  let collapsedItems: BreadcrumbItem[] = [];

  if (maxItems &amp;&amp; items.length &gt; maxItems) {
    // Always show first item, collapsed indicator, and last few items
    const keepFromEnd = Math.max(1, maxItems - 2);
    const firstItem = items[0];
    const lastItems = items.slice(-keepFromEnd);
    collapsedItems = items.slice(1, items.length - keepFromEnd);

    displayItems = [firstItem, ...lastItems];
  }

  const getSeparator = () =&gt; {
    if (typeof separator === &#39;string&#39;) {
      return separators[separator];
    }
    return separator;
  };

  return (
    &lt;nav aria-label=&quot;Breadcrumb&quot; className={cn(&#39;flex items-center&#39;, sizes.container, className)}&gt;
      &lt;ol className=&quot;flex items-center space-x-1&quot;&gt;
        {displayItems.map((item, index) =&gt; {
          const isFirst = index === 0;
          const isLast = index === displayItems.length - 1;
          const showIcon = isFirst &amp;&amp; showHomeIcon;

          return (
            &lt;li key={item.id} className=&quot;flex items-center&quot;&gt;
              {/* Show collapsed items indicator */}
              {isFirst &amp;&amp; collapsedItems.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; (
                &lt;&gt;
                  &lt;BreadcrumbItem
                    item={item}
                    size={size}
                    onItemClick={onItemClick}
                    showIcon={showIcon}
                  /&gt;
                  &lt;span className=&quot;flex-shrink-0 mx-1&quot;&gt;{getSeparator()}&lt;/span&gt;
                  &lt;CollapsedItems items={collapsedItems} size={size} onItemClick={onItemClick} /&gt;
                  {!isLast &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=&quot;flex-shrink-0 mx-1&quot;&gt;{getSeparator()}&lt;/span&gt;}
                &lt;/&gt;
              )}

              {/* Regular item */}
              {(isFirst &amp;&amp; collapsedItems.length === 0) || !isFirst ? (
                &lt;&gt;
                  &lt;BreadcrumbItem
                    item={item}
                    size={size}
                    onItemClick={onItemClick}
                    showIcon={showIcon}
                  /&gt;
                  {!isLast &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=&quot;flex-shrink-0 mx-1&quot;&gt;{getSeparator()}&lt;/span&gt;}
                &lt;/&gt;
              ) : null}
            &lt;/li&gt;
          );
        })}
      &lt;/ol&gt;
    &lt;/nav&gt;
  );
}

// Convenience icons for breadcrumb items
export const breadcrumbIcons = {
  Home,
  Folder,
  File,
} as const;

export default Breadcrumbs;
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/diagrams/FlowDiagram.tsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from &#39;react&#39;;
import mermaid from &#39;mermaid&#39;;
import { apiService } from &#39;../../services/api&#39;;
import type { IRResponse } from &#39;../../types/api&#39;;

interface FlowDiagramProps {
  projectId: string;
  className?: string;
}

interface FlowIRData {
  specHash: string;
  flows: {
    id: string;
    nodes: {
      id: string;
      kind: &#39;visit&#39; | &#39;click&#39; | &#39;fill&#39; | &#39;expect&#39; | &#39;expect_api&#39;;
      label: string;
    }[];
    edges: {
      from: string;
      to: string;
      label?: string;
    }[];
  }[];
}

const FlowDiagram: React.FC&lt;FlowDiagramProps&gt; = ({ projectId, className = &#39;&#39; }) =&gt; {
  const containerRef = useRef&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt;(null);
  const [flowData, setFlowData] = useState&lt;FlowIRData | null&gt;(null);
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState&lt;string | null&gt;(null);

  useEffect(() =&gt; {
    // Initialize mermaid with configuration
    mermaid.initialize({
      startOnLoad: true,
      theme: &#39;default&#39;,
      securityLevel: &#39;loose&#39;,
      flowchart: {
        useMaxWidth: true,
        htmlLabels: true,
        curve: &#39;basis&#39;,
      },
      fontFamily: &#39;Inter, system-ui, sans-serif&#39;,
    });
  }, []);

  useEffect(() =&gt; {
    if (!projectId) return;

    const loadFlowData = async () =&gt; {
      try {
        setLoading(true);
        setError(null);

        const response: IRResponse = await apiService.getIR(projectId, &#39;flow&#39;);
        setFlowData(response.data as FlowIRData);
      } catch (err) {
        console.error(&#39;Failed to load flow data:&#39;, err);
        setError(err instanceof Error ? err.message : &#39;Failed to load flow diagram&#39;);
      } finally {
        setLoading(false);
      }
    };

    loadFlowData();
  }, [projectId]);

  const convertFlowToMermaid = (flows: FlowIRData[&#39;flows&#39;]): string =&gt; {
    if (!flows || flows.length === 0) {
      return `graph TD
        A[No flows defined]
        style A fill:#f9f9f9,stroke:#ccc,stroke-dasharray: 5 5`;
    }

    let mermaidCode = &#39;graph TD\n&#39;;

    // Process each flow
    flows.forEach((flow, flowIndex) =&gt; {
      // Add flow title as a comment
      mermaidCode += `    %% Flow: ${flow.id}\n`;

      // Add nodes with appropriate styling based on their kind
      flow.nodes.forEach(node =&gt; {
        const nodeId = `${flowIndex}_${node.id}`;
        const label = node.label || node.id;

        switch (node.kind) {
          case &#39;visit&#39;:
            mermaidCode += `    ${nodeId}[${label}]\n`;
            mermaidCode += `    style ${nodeId} fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#01579b\n`;
            break;
          case &#39;click&#39;:
            mermaidCode += `    ${nodeId}{${label}}\n`;
            mermaidCode += `    style ${nodeId} fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#4a148c\n`;
            break;
          case &#39;fill&#39;:
            mermaidCode += `    ${nodeId}[/${label}/]\n`;
            mermaidCode += `    style ${nodeId} fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#1b5e20\n`;
            break;
          case &#39;expect&#39;:
            mermaidCode += `    ${nodeId}((${label}))\n`;
            mermaidCode += `    style ${nodeId} fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#e65100\n`;
            break;
          case &#39;expect_api&#39;:
            mermaidCode += `    ${nodeId}{{${label}}}\n`;
            mermaidCode += `    style ${nodeId} fill:#fce4ec,stroke:#880e4f\n`;
            break;
          default:
            mermaidCode += `    ${nodeId}[${label}]\n`;
        }
      });

      // Add edges
      flow.edges.forEach(edge =&gt; {
        const fromId = `${flowIndex}_${edge.from}`;
        const toId = `${flowIndex}_${edge.to}`;
        const label = edge.label ? `|${edge.label}|` : &#39;&#39;;
        mermaidCode += `    ${fromId} --&gt;${label} ${toId}\n`;
      });

      // Add spacing between flows
      if (flowIndex &lt; flows.length - 1) {
        mermaidCode += &#39;\n&#39;;
      }
    });

    return mermaidCode;
  };

  const renderMermaidDiagram = async (mermaidCode: string) =&gt; {
    if (!containerRef.current) return;

    try {
      // Clear previous content
      containerRef.current.innerHTML = &#39;&#39;;

      // Generate unique ID for this diagram
      const diagramId = `mermaid-${Date.now()}`;

      // Render the diagram
      const { svg } = await mermaid.render(diagramId, mermaidCode);

      // Insert the SVG into the container
      containerRef.current.innerHTML = svg;

      // Make sure the SVG is responsive
      const svgElement = containerRef.current.querySelector(&#39;svg&#39;);
      if (svgElement) {
        svgElement.style.maxWidth = &#39;100%&#39;;
        svgElement.style.height = &#39;auto&#39;;
      }
    } catch (err) {
      console.error(&#39;Failed to render mermaid diagram:&#39;, err);
      setError(&#39;Failed to render flow diagram&#39;);
    }
  };

  useEffect(() =&gt; {
    if (flowData &amp;&amp; !loading &amp;&amp; !error) {
      const mermaidCode = convertFlowToMermaid(flowData.flows);
      renderMermaidDiagram(mermaidCode);
    }
  }, [flowData, loading, error]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      &lt;div className={`flex items-center justify-center h-full ${className}`}&gt;
        &lt;div className=&quot;text-center&quot;&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;animate-spin rounded-full h-8 w-8 border-b-2 border-blue-600 mx-auto mb-4&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;p className=&quot;text-gray-600&quot;&gt;Loading flow diagrams...&lt;/p&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      &lt;div className={`flex items-center justify-center h-full ${className}`}&gt;
        &lt;div className=&quot;text-center&quot;&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;text-red-500 mb-4&quot;&gt;
            &lt;svg
              className=&quot;w-12 h-12 mx-auto&quot;
              fill=&quot;none&quot;
              stroke=&quot;currentColor&quot;
              viewBox=&quot;0 0 24 24&quot;
            &gt;
              &lt;path
                strokeLinecap=&quot;round&quot;
                strokeLinejoin=&quot;round&quot;
                strokeWidth={2}
                d=&quot;M12 8v4m0 4h.01M21 12a9 9 0 11-18 0 9 9 0 0118 0z&quot;
              /&gt;
            &lt;/svg&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;p className=&quot;text-red-700 font-medium&quot;&gt;Error loading flow diagram&lt;/p&gt;
          &lt;p className=&quot;text-red-600 text-sm mt-1&quot;&gt;{error}&lt;/p&gt;
          &lt;button
            onClick={() =&gt; window.location.reload()}
            className=&quot;mt-3 px-4 py-2 bg-red-100 text-red-800 rounded-md hover:bg-red-200 transition-colors&quot;
          &gt;
            Retry
          &lt;/button&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }

  return (
    &lt;div className={`h-full overflow-auto ${className}`}&gt;
      &lt;div className=&quot;p-4&quot;&gt;
        {flowData?.flows &amp;&amp; flowData.flows.length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;div className=&quot;mb-4&quot;&gt;
            &lt;h3 className=&quot;text-lg font-medium text-gray-900&quot;&gt;Flow Diagrams&lt;/h3&gt;
            &lt;p className=&quot;text-sm text-gray-600&quot;&gt;
              Showing {flowData.flows.length} flow{flowData.flows.length !== 1 ? &#39;s&#39; : &#39;&#39;}
            &lt;/p&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        )}
        &lt;div
          ref={containerRef}
          className=&quot;mermaid-container bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-4 min-h-[400px] flex items-center justify-center&quot;
        /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
};

export default FlowDiagram;
📄 packages/cli/src/commands/preview.ts
/**
 * Preview command - Generate deterministic plans showing what would be created
 *
 * This command analyzes the assembly.cue file and shows what would be generated
 * without actually creating files. Critical for deterministic output testing.
 */

import fs from &#39;node:fs&#39;;
import path from &#39;node:path&#39;;
import chalk from &#39;chalk&#39;;
import type { Config } from &#39;../config.js&#39;;

export interface PreviewOptions {
  format?: &#39;json&#39; | &#39;yaml&#39; | &#39;text&#39;;
  output?: string;
  outputDir?: string;
  verbose?: boolean;
  includeContent?: boolean;
}

interface PreviewPlan {
  timestamp: string;
  assembly: {
    language: string;
    kind: string;
    name: string;
    version: string;
    buildTool?: string;
  };
  plannedFiles: Array&lt;{
    path: string;
    type: &#39;file&#39; | &#39;directory&#39;;
    size?: number;
    checksum?: string;
    content?: string;
  }&gt;;
  operations: Array&lt;{
    type: &#39;create&#39; | &#39;update&#39; | &#39;delete&#39;;
    target: string;
    reason: string;
  }&gt;;
  metadata: {
    totalFiles: number;
    totalDirectories: number;
    estimatedSize: number;
  };
}

/**
 * Main preview command implementation
 */
export async function previewCommand(options: PreviewOptions, _config: Config): Promise&lt;number&gt; {
  try {
    if (options.verbose) {
      console.log(chalk.blue(&#39;🔍 Generating deterministic preview plan...&#39;));
    }

    // Read assembly file
    const assemblyPath = resolveAssemblyPath();
    if (!assemblyPath) {
      console.error(chalk.red(&#39;❌ No assembly specification found&#39;));
      console.log(chalk.dim(&#39;Initialize a project with: arbiter init&#39;));
      return 1;
    }

    const assemblyContent = fs.readFileSync(assemblyPath, &#39;utf-8&#39;);
    const assemblyConfig = parseAssemblyFile(assemblyContent);

    // Generate deterministic plan
    const plan = await generatePreviewPlan(assemblyConfig, options);

    // Output plan in requested format
    let output: string;
    switch (options.format) {
      case &#39;json&#39;:
        output = JSON.stringify(plan, null, 2);
        break;
      case &#39;yaml&#39;:
        output = convertToYAML(plan);
        break;
      default:
        output = formatAsText(plan, options.verbose);
        break;
    }

    // Write to file or stdout
    if (options.output) {
      const outputDir = options.outputDir || &#39;.&#39;;
      const outputPath = path.isAbsolute(options.output)
        ? options.output
        : path.join(outputDir, options.output);

      // Ensure output directory exists
      fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(outputPath), { recursive: true });

      fs.writeFileSync(outputPath, output);
      if (options.verbose) {
        console.log(chalk.green(`✅ Preview plan written to ${outputPath}`));
      }
    } else {
      console.log(output);
    }

    return 0;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(
      chalk.red(&#39;❌ Preview failed:&#39;),
      error instanceof Error ? error.message : String(error)
    );
    return 1;
  }
}

function resolveAssemblyPath(): string | null {
  const primary = path.resolve(&#39;.arbiter&#39;, &#39;assembly.cue&#39;);
  if (fs.existsSync(primary)) {
    return primary;
  }

  const arbiterDir = path.resolve(&#39;.arbiter&#39;);
  if (fs.existsSync(arbiterDir)) {
    const entries = fs.readdirSync(arbiterDir, { withFileTypes: true });
    for (const entry of entries) {
      if (!entry.isDirectory()) continue;
      const candidate = path.join(arbiterDir, entry.name, &#39;assembly.cue&#39;);
      if (fs.existsSync(candidate)) {
        return candidate;
      }
    }
  }

  return null;
}

/**
 * Parse assembly.cue file and extract configuration
 */
function parseAssemblyFile(content: string): any {
  // Basic CUE parsing - extract key information
  const config: any = {
    kind: &#39;library&#39;,
    language: &#39;typescript&#39;,
    name: &#39;unknown&#39;,
    version: &#39;1.0.0&#39;,
  };

  // Extract language
  const langMatch = content.match(/language:\s*&quot;([^&quot;]+)&quot;/);
  if (langMatch) {
    config.language = langMatch[1];
  }

  // Extract kind
  const kindMatch = content.match(/kind:\s*&quot;([^&quot;]+)&quot;/);
  if (kindMatch) {
    config.kind = kindMatch[1];
  }

  // Extract name from metadata
  const nameMatch = content.match(/name:\s*&quot;([^&quot;]+)&quot;/);
  if (nameMatch) {
    config.name = nameMatch[1];
  }

  // Extract version
  const versionMatch = content.match(/version:\s*&quot;([^&quot;]+)&quot;/);
  if (versionMatch) {
    config.version = versionMatch[1];
  }

  // Extract build tool
  const toolMatch = content.match(/tool:\s*&quot;([^&quot;]+)&quot;/);
  if (toolMatch) {
    config.buildTool = toolMatch[1];
  }

  return config;
}

/**
 * Generate a deterministic preview plan
 */
async function generatePreviewPlan(
  assemblyConfig: any,
  options: PreviewOptions
): Promise&lt;PreviewPlan&gt; {
  const plan: PreviewPlan = {
    // Use fixed timestamp for deterministic output
    timestamp: &#39;2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z&#39;,
    assembly: assemblyConfig,
    plannedFiles: [],
    operations: [],
    metadata: {
      totalFiles: 0,
      totalDirectories: 0,
      estimatedSize: 0,
    },
  };

  // Plan language-specific files
  const languageFiles = planLanguageFiles(assemblyConfig);
  plan.plannedFiles.push(...languageFiles);

  // Plan project structure files
  const structureFiles = planProjectStructure(assemblyConfig);
  plan.plannedFiles.push(...structureFiles);

  // Plan CI files if applicable
  if (assemblyConfig.ci !== false) {
    const ciFiles = planCIFiles(assemblyConfig);
    plan.plannedFiles.push(...ciFiles);
  }

  // Generate operations
  plan.operations = plan.plannedFiles.map(file =&gt; ({
    type: &#39;create&#39; as const,
    target: file.path,
    reason: `Generate ${file.type} for ${assemblyConfig.language} ${assemblyConfig.kind}`,
  }));

  // Calculate metadata
  plan.metadata.totalFiles = plan.plannedFiles.filter(f =&gt; f.type === &#39;file&#39;).length;
  plan.metadata.totalDirectories = plan.plannedFiles.filter(f =&gt; f.type === &#39;directory&#39;).length;
  plan.metadata.estimatedSize = plan.plannedFiles.reduce((sum, f) =&gt; sum + (f.size || 0), 0);

  // Add content if requested (for deterministic comparison)
  if (options.includeContent) {
    plan.plannedFiles.forEach(file =&gt; {
      if (file.type === &#39;file&#39;) {
        file.content = generateFileContent(file.path, assemblyConfig);
        file.checksum = generateChecksum(file.content);
        file.size = file.content.length;
      }
    });
  }

  return plan;
}

/**
 * Plan language-specific files
 */
function planLanguageFiles(
  config: any
): Array&lt;{ path: string; type: &#39;file&#39; | &#39;directory&#39;; size?: number }&gt; {
  const files: Array&lt;{ path: string; type: &#39;file&#39; | &#39;directory&#39;; size?: number }&gt; = [];

  switch (config.language) {
    case &#39;typescript&#39;:
      files.push(
        { path: &#39;package.json&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 500 },
        { path: &#39;tsconfig.json&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 300 },
        { path: &#39;src/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; },
        { path: &#39;src/index.ts&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 200 },
        { path: &#39;tests/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; }
      );
      break;
    case &#39;python&#39;:
      files.push(
        { path: &#39;pyproject.toml&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 400 },
        { path: &#39;requirements.txt&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 100 },
        { path: `src/${config.name}/`, type: &#39;directory&#39; },
        { path: `src/${config.name}/__init__.py`, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 150 },
        { path: `src/${config.name}/main.py`, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 200 },
        { path: &#39;tests/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; }
      );
      break;
    case &#39;rust&#39;:
      files.push(
        { path: &#39;Cargo.toml&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 200 },
        { path: &#39;src/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; },
        { path: &#39;src/lib.rs&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 300 },
        { path: &#39;tests/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; }
      );
      break;
    case &#39;go&#39;:
      files.push(
        { path: &#39;go.mod&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 100 },
        { path: &#39;main.go&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 250 },
        { path: &#39;test/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; }
      );
      break;
    case &#39;shell&#39;:
    case &#39;bash&#39;:
      files.push(
        { path: &#39;Makefile&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 300 },
        { path: &#39;src/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; },
        { path: `src/${config.name}`, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 400 },
        { path: &#39;tests/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; }
      );
      break;
  }

  return files;
}

/**
 * Plan project structure files
 */
function planProjectStructure(
  _config: any
): Array&lt;{ path: string; type: &#39;file&#39; | &#39;directory&#39;; size?: number }&gt; {
  return [
    { path: &#39;README.md&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 800 },
    { path: &#39;.gitignore&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 200 },
  ];
}

/**
 * Plan CI/CD files
 */
function planCIFiles(
  _config: any
): Array&lt;{ path: string; type: &#39;file&#39; | &#39;directory&#39;; size?: number }&gt; {
  return [
    { path: &#39;.github/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; },
    { path: &#39;.github/workflows/&#39;, type: &#39;directory&#39; },
    { path: &#39;.github/workflows/ci.yml&#39;, type: &#39;file&#39;, size: 600 },
  ];
}

/**
 * Generate deterministic file content for checksums
 */
function generateFileContent(filePath: string, config: any): string {
  // Return predictable content based on file path and config
  // This ensures identical runs produce identical output

  if (filePath === &#39;README.md&#39;) {
    return `# ${config.name}\n\nGenerated by Arbiter - Version ${config.version}\n`;
  }

  if (filePath === &#39;package.json&#39;) {
    return JSON.stringify(
      {
        name: config.name,
        version: config.version,
        type: &#39;module&#39;,
      },
      null,
      2
    );
  }

  if (filePath.endsWith(&#39;.ts&#39;)) {
    return `// ${config.name} - Generated by Arbiter\nexport function main() {\n  console.log(&#39;Hello!&#39;);\n}\n`;
  }

  if (filePath.endsWith(&#39;.py&#39;)) {
    return `# ${config.name} - Generated by Arbiter\ndef main():\n    print(&#39;Hello!&#39;)\n`;
  }

  if (filePath.endsWith(&#39;.rs&#39;)) {
    return `// ${config.name} - Generated by Arbiter\npub fn main() {\n    println!(&quot;Hello!&quot;);\n}\n`;
  }

  if (filePath.endsWith(&#39;.go&#39;)) {
    return `// ${config.name} - Generated by Arbiter\npackage main\n\nimport &quot;fmt&quot;\n\nfunc main() {\n    fmt.Println(&quot;Hello!&quot;)\n}\n`;
  }

  if (filePath.endsWith(&#39;.yml&#39;) || filePath.endsWith(&#39;.yaml&#39;)) {
    return `# ${config.name} CI - Generated by Arbiter\nname: CI\n\non: [push, pull_request]\n\njobs:\n  test:\n    runs-on: ubuntu-latest\n    steps:\n      - uses: actions/checkout@v4\n`;
  }

  // Default content
  return `# Generated by Arbiter for ${config.name}\n`;
}

/**
 * Generate a simple checksum for content
 */
function generateChecksum(content: string): string {
  // Simple hash for deterministic checksums
  let hash = 0;
  for (let i = 0; i &lt; content.length; i++) {
    const char = content.charCodeAt(i);
    hash = (hash &lt;&lt; 5) - hash + char;
    hash = hash &amp; hash; // Convert to 32bit integer
  }
  return Math.abs(hash).toString(16);
}

/**
 * Convert plan to YAML format
 */
function convertToYAML(plan: PreviewPlan): string {
  // Simple YAML conversion
  return `timestamp: &quot;${plan.timestamp}&quot;
assembly:
  language: &quot;${plan.assembly.language}&quot;
  kind: &quot;${plan.assembly.kind}&quot;
  name: &quot;${plan.assembly.name}&quot;
  version: &quot;${plan.assembly.version}&quot;
plannedFiles:
${plan.plannedFiles.map(f =&gt; `  - path: &quot;${f.path}&quot;\n    type: &quot;${f.type}&quot;`).join(&#39;\n&#39;)}
operations:
${plan.operations.map(op =&gt; `  - type: &quot;${op.type}&quot;\n    target: &quot;${op.target}&quot;\n    reason: &quot;${op.reason}&quot;`).join(&#39;\n&#39;)}
metadata:
  totalFiles: ${plan.metadata.totalFiles}
  totalDirectories: ${plan.metadata.totalDirectories}
  estimatedSize: ${plan.metadata.estimatedSize}
`;
}

/**
 * Format plan as human-readable text
 */
function formatAsText(plan: PreviewPlan, verbose = false): string {
  let output = &#39;&#39;;

  if (verbose) {
    output += chalk.blue(&#39;📋 Preview Plan\n&#39;);
    output += chalk.dim(`Generated: ${plan.timestamp}\n\n`);
  }

  output += chalk.cyan(&#39;Assembly Configuration:\n&#39;);
  output += `  Language: ${plan.assembly.language}\n`;
  output += `  Kind: ${plan.assembly.kind}\n`;
  output += `  Name: ${plan.assembly.name}\n`;
  output += `  Version: ${plan.assembly.version}\n`;
  if (plan.assembly.buildTool) {
    output += `  Build Tool: ${plan.assembly.buildTool}\n`;
  }
  output += &#39;\n&#39;;

  output += chalk.cyan(&#39;Planned Files:\n&#39;);
  const files = plan.plannedFiles.filter(f =&gt; f.type === &#39;file&#39;);
  const dirs = plan.plannedFiles.filter(f =&gt; f.type === &#39;directory&#39;);

  dirs.forEach(dir =&gt; {
    output += chalk.yellow(`  📁 ${dir.path}\n`);
  });

  files.forEach(file =&gt; {
    output += chalk.green(`  📄 ${file.path}`);
    if (file.size) {
      output += chalk.dim(` (${file.size} bytes)`);
    }
    if (file.checksum &amp;&amp; verbose) {
      output += chalk.dim(` [${file.checksum}]`);
    }
    output += &#39;\n&#39;;
  });

  output += &#39;\n&#39;;
  output += chalk.cyan(&#39;Summary:\n&#39;);
  output += `  Files: ${plan.metadata.totalFiles}\n`;
  output += `  Directories: ${plan.metadata.totalDirectories}\n`;
  output += `  Estimated Size: ${plan.metadata.estimatedSize} bytes\n`;

  if (verbose) {
    output += &#39;\n&#39;;
    output += chalk.cyan(&#39;Operations:\n&#39;);
    plan.operations.forEach(op =&gt; {
      output += `  ${op.type.toUpperCase()} ${op.target} - ${op.reason}\n`;
    });
  }

  return output;
}
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/design-system/components/Input.tsx
/**
 * Input Component - Design System
 * Professional input with comprehensive variants, states, and accessibility
 * Designed for developer tools with sophisticated graphite theme
 */

import React, { forwardRef, type InputHTMLAttributes, type ReactNode } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { clsx } from &#39;clsx&#39;;
import { AlertCircle, CheckCircle, AlertTriangle, Loader2 } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;
import { inputVariants, sizeVariants, cn } from &#39;../variants&#39;;

export interface InputProps extends Omit&lt;InputHTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLInputElement&gt;, &#39;size&#39;&gt; {
  /** Input variant determines the visual style */
  variant?: &#39;default&#39; | &#39;error&#39; | &#39;success&#39; | &#39;warning&#39;;

  /** Input size affects padding and font size */
  size?: &#39;sm&#39; | &#39;md&#39; | &#39;lg&#39;;

  /** Whether the input should take full width of container */
  fullWidth?: boolean;

  /** Icon to display before the input */
  leftIcon?: ReactNode;

  /** Icon to display after the input */
  rightIcon?: ReactNode;

  /** Label for the input */
  label?: string;

  /** Helper text below the input */
  helperText?: string;

  /** Error message (sets variant to error automatically) */
  error?: string;

  /** Warning message (sets variant to warning automatically) */
  warning?: string;

  /** Success message (sets variant to success automatically) */
  success?: string;

  /** Whether the input is in a loading state */
  loading?: boolean;

  /** Whether to show validation icons automatically */
  showValidationIcon?: boolean;

  /** Whether to show the label */
  hideLabel?: boolean;

  /** Whether the label should be inside the input (floating) */
  floatingLabel?: boolean;

  /** Additional description text */
  description?: string;

  /** Custom className for additional styling */
  className?: string;

  /** Custom className for the wrapper */
  wrapperClassName?: string;

  /** Custom className for the input wrapper */
  inputWrapperClassName?: string;
}

export const Input = forwardRef&lt;HTMLInputElement, InputProps&gt;(
  (
    {
      variant = &#39;default&#39;,
      size = &#39;md&#39;,
      fullWidth = true,
      leftIcon,
      rightIcon,
      label,
      helperText,
      error,
      warning,
      success,
      loading = false,
      showValidationIcon = true,
      hideLabel = false,
      floatingLabel = false,
      description,
      className,
      wrapperClassName,
      inputWrapperClassName,
      disabled,
      id,
      ...props
    },
    ref
  ) =&gt; {
    // Determine actual variant based on state props
    const actualVariant = error ? &#39;error&#39; : warning ? &#39;warning&#39; : success ? &#39;success&#39; : variant;
    const actualHelperText = error || warning || success || helperText;
    const inputId = id || `input-${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;

    // Validation icon logic
    const getValidationIcon = () =&gt; {
      if (!showValidationIcon || loading) return null;

      if (error) return &lt;AlertCircle className={cn(sizeVariants.icon[size], &#39;text-red-500&#39;)} /&gt;;
      if (warning)
        return &lt;AlertTriangle className={cn(sizeVariants.icon[size], &#39;text-amber-500&#39;)} /&gt;;
      if (success) return &lt;CheckCircle className={cn(sizeVariants.icon[size], &#39;text-green-500&#39;)} /&gt;;

      return null;
    };

    const validationIcon = getValidationIcon();
    const hasRightElement = rightIcon || validationIcon || loading;

    const inputClasses = cn(
      // Base styles
      &#39;block w-full font-sans&#39;,
      &#39;transition-all duration-150 ease-in-out&#39;,
      &#39;placeholder:text-graphite-400&#39;,
      &#39;focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-0&#39;,

      // Variant styles
      inputVariants[actualVariant],

      // Size styles
      sizeVariants.input[size],

      // Icon padding adjustments
      leftIcon &amp;&amp; (size === &#39;lg&#39; ? &#39;pl-12&#39; : size === &#39;sm&#39; ? &#39;pl-8&#39; : &#39;pl-10&#39;),
      hasRightElement &amp;&amp; (size === &#39;lg&#39; ? &#39;pr-12&#39; : size === &#39;sm&#39; ? &#39;pr-8&#39; : &#39;pr-10&#39;),

      // Loading state
      loading &amp;&amp; &#39;cursor-wait&#39;,

      // Floating label adjustments
      floatingLabel &amp;&amp; &#39;pt-6 pb-2&#39;,

      // Custom className
      className
    );

    const wrapperClasses = cn(
      &#39;space-y-1&#39;,
      !fullWidth &amp;&amp; &#39;inline-block&#39;,
      disabled &amp;&amp; &#39;opacity-60 cursor-not-allowed&#39;,
      wrapperClassName
    );

    const inputWrapperClasses = cn(&#39;relative&#39;, inputWrapperClassName);

    return (
      &lt;div className={wrapperClasses}&gt;
        {/* Label */}
        {label &amp;&amp; !hideLabel &amp;&amp; !floatingLabel &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;label htmlFor={inputId} className=&quot;block text-sm font-medium text-graphite-700&quot;&gt;
            {label}
            {props.required &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=&quot;text-red-500 ml-1&quot;&gt;*&lt;/span&gt;}
          &lt;/label&gt;
        )}

        {/* Description */}
        {description &amp;&amp; !floatingLabel &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;p className=&quot;text-sm text-graphite-600&quot;&gt;{description}&lt;/p&gt;
        )}

        {/* Input wrapper */}
        &lt;div className={inputWrapperClasses}&gt;
          {/* Floating label */}
          {label &amp;&amp; !hideLabel &amp;&amp; floatingLabel &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;label
              htmlFor={inputId}
              className={cn(
                &#39;absolute left-3 transition-all duration-150 pointer-events-none&#39;,
                &#39;text-sm font-medium&#39;,
                props.value || props.defaultValue
                  ? &#39;top-2 text-xs text-graphite-600&#39;
                  : &#39;top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-graphite-500&#39;,
                actualVariant === &#39;error&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-red-600&#39;,
                actualVariant === &#39;warning&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-amber-600&#39;,
                actualVariant === &#39;success&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-green-600&#39;
              )}
            &gt;
              {label}
              {props.required &amp;&amp; &lt;span className=&quot;text-red-500 ml-1&quot;&gt;*&lt;/span&gt;}
            &lt;/label&gt;
          )}

          {/* Left icon */}
          {leftIcon &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;div
              className={cn(
                &#39;absolute top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 text-graphite-400&#39;,
                size === &#39;lg&#39; ? &#39;left-4&#39; : size === &#39;sm&#39; ? &#39;left-2&#39; : &#39;left-3&#39;
              )}
            &gt;
              &lt;div className={sizeVariants.icon[size]}&gt;{leftIcon}&lt;/div&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
          )}

          {/* Input field */}
          &lt;input
            ref={ref}
            id={inputId}
            disabled={disabled || loading}
            className={inputClasses}
            aria-describedby={cn(
              actualHelperText &amp;&amp; `${inputId}-description`,
              description &amp;&amp; `${inputId}-desc`
            )}
            aria-invalid={!!error}
            {...props}
          /&gt;

          {/* Right side elements */}
          &lt;div
            className={cn(
              &#39;absolute top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 flex items-center gap-1&#39;,
              size === &#39;lg&#39; ? &#39;right-4&#39; : size === &#39;sm&#39; ? &#39;right-2&#39; : &#39;right-3&#39;
            )}
          &gt;
            {/* Loading spinner */}
            {loading &amp;&amp; (
              &lt;Loader2 className={cn(sizeVariants.icon[size], &#39;animate-spin text-graphite-400&#39;)} /&gt;
            )}

            {/* Validation icon */}
            {validationIcon}

            {/* Right icon */}
            {rightIcon &amp;&amp; (
              &lt;div className=&quot;text-graphite-400&quot;&gt;
                &lt;div className={sizeVariants.icon[size]}&gt;{rightIcon}&lt;/div&gt;
              &lt;/div&gt;
            )}
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;

        {/* Description for floating label variant */}
        {description &amp;&amp; floatingLabel &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;p id={`${inputId}-desc`} className=&quot;text-sm text-graphite-600&quot;&gt;
            {description}
          &lt;/p&gt;
        )}

        {/* Helper text / Validation messages */}
        {actualHelperText &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;p
            id={`${inputId}-description`}
            className={cn(
              &#39;text-sm flex items-start gap-1&#39;,
              actualVariant === &#39;error&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-red-600&#39;,
              actualVariant === &#39;warning&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-amber-600&#39;,
              actualVariant === &#39;success&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-green-600&#39;,
              actualVariant === &#39;default&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-graphite-600&#39;
            )}
          &gt;
            {actualHelperText}
          &lt;/p&gt;
        )}
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }
);

Input.displayName = &#39;Input&#39;;

export default Input;
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/components/diagrams/PlotsDiagram.tsx
import React, { useState, useEffect } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { CuePlotViewer } from &#39;../charts/CuePlotViewer&#39;;
import { apiService } from &#39;../../services/api&#39;;
import { Loader2, AlertCircle, BarChart3 } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;

interface PlotsDiagramProps {
  projectId: string;
}

const PlotsDiagram: React.FC&lt;PlotsDiagramProps&gt; = ({ projectId }) =&gt; {
  const [plotData, setPlotData] = useState&lt;Record&lt;string, any&gt;&gt;({});
  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
  const [error, setError] = useState&lt;string | null&gt;(null);

  useEffect(() =&gt; {
    let mounted = true;

    const loadPlotData = async () =&gt; {
      try {
        setLoading(true);
        setError(null);

        // For now, use sample data while we fix the API integration
        const samplePlots = {
          plots: {
            lineChart: {
              title: &#39;Server Response Time&#39;,
              type: &#39;line&#39;,
              data: {
                labels: [&#39;00:00&#39;, &#39;01:00&#39;, &#39;02:00&#39;, &#39;03:00&#39;, &#39;04:00&#39;, &#39;05:00&#39;, &#39;06:00&#39;],
                datasets: [
                  {
                    label: &#39;Response Time (ms)&#39;,
                    data: [120, 150, 180, 160, 140, 130, 125],
                    backgroundColor: &#39;#dbeafe&#39;,
                    borderColor: &#39;#3b82f6&#39;,
                    fill: false,
                  },
                ],
              },
              options: {
                responsive: true,
                scales: {
                  y: {
                    beginAtZero: true,
                    title: {
                      display: true,
                      text: &#39;Response Time (ms)&#39;,
                    },
                  },
                  x: {
                    title: {
                      display: true,
                      text: &#39;Time&#39;,
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            barChart: {
              title: &#39;Service Usage by Hour&#39;,
              type: &#39;bar&#39;,
              data: {
                labels: [&#39;API&#39;, &#39;Database&#39;, &#39;Cache&#39;, &#39;Queue&#39;, &#39;Storage&#39;],
                datasets: [
                  {
                    label: &#39;Requests per Second&#39;,
                    data: [65, 59, 80, 81, 56],
                    backgroundColor: [&#39;#ef4444&#39;, &#39;#f59e0b&#39;, &#39;#10b981&#39;, &#39;#3b82f6&#39;, &#39;#8b5cf6&#39;],
                    borderColor: [&#39;#dc2626&#39;, &#39;#d97706&#39;, &#39;#059669&#39;, &#39;#2563eb&#39;, &#39;#7c3aed&#39;],
                    borderWidth: 1,
                  },
                ],
              },
              options: {
                responsive: true,
                scales: {
                  y: {
                    beginAtZero: true,
                    title: {
                      display: true,
                      text: &#39;Requests/sec&#39;,
                    },
                  },
                },
              },
            },
            timeSeriesChart: {
              title: &#39;System Metrics Over Time&#39;,
              type: &#39;line&#39;,
              data: {
                labels: [
                  &#39;2024-01-01T00:00:00Z&#39;,
                  &#39;2024-01-01T01:00:00Z&#39;,
                  &#39;2024-01-01T02:00:00Z&#39;,
                  &#39;2024-01-01T03:00:00Z&#39;,
                  &#39;2024-01-01T04:00:00Z&#39;,
                  &#39;2024-01-01T05:00:00Z&#39;,
                ],
                datasets: [
                  {
                    label: &#39;CPU Usage (%)&#39;,
                    data: [45, 52, 48, 61, 55, 47],
                    borderColor: &#39;#3b82f6&#39;,
                    backgroundColor: &#39;#dbeafe&#39;,
                    fill: false,
                  },
                  {
                    label: &#39;Memory Usage (%)&#39;,
                    data: [62, 68, 71, 75, 73, 69],
                    borderColor: &#39;#10b981&#39;,
                    backgroundColor: &#39;#d1fae5&#39;,
                    fill: false,
                  },
                ],
              },
              options: {
                responsive: true,
                interaction: {
                  mode: &#39;index&#39;,
                  intersect: false,
                },
                scales: {
                  x: {
                    display: true,
                    title: {
                      display: true,
                      text: &#39;Time&#39;,
                    },
                  },
                  y: {
                    display: true,
                    title: {
                      display: true,
                      text: &#39;Usage (%)&#39;,
                    },
                    min: 0,
                    max: 100,
                  },
                },
                plugins: {
                  legend: {
                    position: &#39;top&#39;,
                  },
                  title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: &#39;System Resource Usage&#39;,
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        };

        setPlotData(samplePlots);

        // TODO: Uncomment when API integration is working
        // const resolved = await apiService.getResolvedSpec(projectId);
        // if (resolved &amp;&amp; resolved.resolved &amp;&amp; resolved.resolved.plots) {
        //   setPlotData(resolved.resolved);
        // }
      } catch (err) {
        if (!mounted) return;
        console.error(&#39;Failed to load plot data:&#39;, err);
        setError(err instanceof Error ? err.message : &#39;Failed to load plot data&#39;);
      } finally {
        if (mounted) {
          setLoading(false);
        }
      }
    };

    loadPlotData();

    return () =&gt; {
      mounted = false;
    };
  }, [projectId]);

  if (loading) {
    return (
      &lt;div className=&quot;diagram-container&quot;&gt;
        &lt;div className=&quot;diagram-loading&quot;&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;text-center&quot;&gt;
            &lt;Loader2 className=&quot;h-8 w-8 mb-4 mx-auto animate-spin text-blue-500&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;p className=&quot;text-gray-600&quot;&gt;Loading plot data...&lt;/p&gt;
            &lt;p className=&quot;text-sm text-gray-400 mt-2&quot;&gt;
              Parsing CUE specifications for visualization data
            &lt;/p&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }

  if (error) {
    return (
      &lt;div className=&quot;diagram-container&quot;&gt;
        &lt;div className=&quot;diagram-error&quot;&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-6 text-center&quot;&gt;
            &lt;AlertCircle className=&quot;h-12 w-12 text-red-400 mx-auto mb-4&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;h3 className=&quot;text-lg font-semibold text-red-800 mb-2&quot;&gt;Failed to Load Plot Data&lt;/h3&gt;
            &lt;p className=&quot;text-red-600 mb-4&quot;&gt;{error}&lt;/p&gt;
            &lt;button
              onClick={() =&gt; window.location.reload()}
              className=&quot;px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 text-white rounded hover:bg-red-700 transition-colors&quot;
            &gt;
              Retry
            &lt;/button&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }

  if (!plotData || Object.keys(plotData).length === 0) {
    return (
      &lt;div className=&quot;diagram-container&quot;&gt;
        &lt;div className=&quot;bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-8 text-center&quot;&gt;
          &lt;BarChart3 className=&quot;h-12 w-12 text-gray-400 mx-auto mb-4&quot; /&gt;
          &lt;h3 className=&quot;text-lg font-semibold text-gray-700 mb-2&quot;&gt;No Plot Data Available&lt;/h3&gt;
          &lt;p className=&quot;text-gray-600 mb-4&quot;&gt;
            No visualization data found in the CUE specification.
          &lt;/p&gt;
          &lt;div className=&quot;text-left bg-white border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-4 max-w-md mx-auto&quot;&gt;
            &lt;h4 className=&quot;font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2&quot;&gt;
              To add plots, define them in your CUE files then export as JSON:
            &lt;/h4&gt;
            &lt;pre className=&quot;text-xs font-mono text-gray-600 whitespace-pre-wrap&quot;&gt;
              {`// In your CUE file:
myChart: {
  title: &quot;Sample Chart&quot;
  type: &quot;line&quot;
  data: {
    labels: [&quot;Jan&quot;, &quot;Feb&quot;, &quot;Mar&quot;]
    datasets: [{
      label: &quot;Sales&quot;
      data: [100, 150, 200]
      backgroundColor: &quot;#3b82f6&quot;
    }]
  }
}

// Export with: cue export -o plots.json`}
            &lt;/pre&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }

  return (
    &lt;div className=&quot;diagram-container h-full overflow-auto&quot;&gt;
      &lt;div className=&quot;p-6&quot;&gt;
        &lt;CuePlotViewer plotData={plotData} projectId={projectId} mode=&quot;plots&quot; className=&quot;h-full&quot; /&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
  );
};

export default PlotsDiagram;
📄 apps/web/frontend/src/design-system/components/Card.tsx
/**
 * Card Component - Design System
 * Professional card container with comprehensive variants and states
 * Designed for developer tools with sophisticated graphite theme
 */

import React, { forwardRef, type HTMLAttributes, type ReactNode } from &#39;react&#39;;
import { clsx } from &#39;clsx&#39;;
import { cn } from &#39;../variants&#39;;

export interface CardProps extends HTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLDivElement&gt; {
  /** Card variant determines the visual style and interaction behavior */
  variant?: &#39;default&#39; | &#39;interactive&#39; | &#39;elevated&#39; | &#39;outlined&#39; | &#39;ghost&#39;;

  /** Card size affects padding and border radius */
  size?: &#39;sm&#39; | &#39;md&#39; | &#39;lg&#39; | &#39;xl&#39;;

  /** Card header content */
  header?: ReactNode;

  /** Card title */
  title?: string;

  /** Card subtitle or description */
  subtitle?: string;

  /** Card footer content */
  footer?: ReactNode;

  /** Whether to show a divider between header and content */
  headerDivider?: boolean;

  /** Whether to show a divider between content and footer */
  footerDivider?: boolean;

  /** Whether the card has a loading state */
  loading?: boolean;

  /** Whether the card is disabled */
  disabled?: boolean;

  /** Whether the card is selected */
  selected?: boolean;

  /** Whether the card has hover effects */
  hoverable?: boolean;

  /** Custom className for additional styling */
  className?: string;

  /** Custom className for the header */
  headerClassName?: string;

  /** Custom className for the body */
  bodyClassName?: string;

  /** Custom className for the footer */
  footerClassName?: string;

  /** Card content */
  children?: ReactNode;
}

export const Card = forwardRef&lt;HTMLDivElement, CardProps&gt;(
  (
    {
      variant = &#39;default&#39;,
      size = &#39;md&#39;,
      header,
      title,
      subtitle,
      footer,
      headerDivider = false,
      footerDivider = false,
      loading = false,
      disabled = false,
      selected = false,
      hoverable = false,
      className,
      headerClassName,
      bodyClassName,
      footerClassName,
      children,
      onClick,
      ...props
    },
    ref
  ) =&gt; {
    // Card size classes
    const sizeClasses = {
      sm: {
        card: &#39;rounded-lg&#39;,
        padding: &#39;p-3&#39;,
        headerPadding: &#39;px-3 pt-3&#39;,
        bodyPadding: &#39;px-3&#39;,
        footerPadding: &#39;px-3 pb-3&#39;,
        gap: &#39;space-y-2&#39;,
      },
      md: {
        card: &#39;rounded-lg&#39;,
        padding: &#39;p-4&#39;,
        headerPadding: &#39;px-4 pt-4&#39;,
        bodyPadding: &#39;px-4&#39;,
        footerPadding: &#39;px-4 pb-4&#39;,
        gap: &#39;space-y-3&#39;,
      },
      lg: {
        card: &#39;rounded-xl&#39;,
        padding: &#39;p-6&#39;,
        headerPadding: &#39;px-6 pt-6&#39;,
        bodyPadding: &#39;px-6&#39;,
        footerPadding: &#39;px-6 pb-6&#39;,
        gap: &#39;space-y-4&#39;,
      },
      xl: {
        card: &#39;rounded-xl&#39;,
        padding: &#39;p-8&#39;,
        headerPadding: &#39;px-8 pt-8&#39;,
        bodyPadding: &#39;px-8&#39;,
        footerPadding: &#39;px-8 pb-8&#39;,
        gap: &#39;space-y-6&#39;,
      },
    };

    const sizeClass = sizeClasses[size];

    // Card variant classes
    const variantClasses = {
      default: cn(
        &#39;bg-white border border-graphite-200 shadow-sm&#39;,
        hoverable &amp;&amp; &#39;hover:border-graphite-300 hover:shadow-md&#39;,
        selected &amp;&amp; &#39;border-blue-500 ring-1 ring-blue-500 ring-opacity-20&#39;
      ),
      interactive: cn(
        &#39;bg-white border border-graphite-200 shadow-sm&#39;,
        &#39;hover:border-graphite-300 hover:shadow-md hover:shadow-graphite-900/5&#39;,
        &#39;active:scale-[0.998] active:shadow-sm&#39;,
        &#39;transition-all duration-150 ease-out cursor-pointer&#39;,
        selected &amp;&amp; &#39;border-blue-500 ring-1 ring-blue-500 ring-opacity-20&#39;,
        disabled &amp;&amp;
          &#39;cursor-not-allowed opacity-60 hover:border-graphite-200 hover:shadow-sm active:scale-100&#39;
      ),
      elevated: cn(
        &#39;bg-white border-0 shadow-lg shadow-graphite-900/10&#39;,
        hoverable &amp;&amp; &#39;hover:shadow-xl hover:shadow-graphite-900/15&#39;,
        selected &amp;&amp; &#39;ring-1 ring-blue-500 ring-opacity-30&#39;
      ),
      outlined: cn(
        &#39;bg-transparent border-2 border-graphite-300&#39;,
        hoverable &amp;&amp; &#39;hover:border-graphite-400 hover:bg-graphite-50&#39;,
        selected &amp;&amp; &#39;border-blue-500 bg-blue-50&#39;
      ),
      ghost: cn(
        &#39;bg-transparent border-0 shadow-none&#39;,
        hoverable &amp;&amp; &#39;hover:bg-graphite-50&#39;,
        selected &amp;&amp; &#39;bg-blue-50&#39;
      ),
    };

    const cardClasses = cn(
      // Base styles
      &#39;relative transition-all duration-150 ease-out overflow-hidden&#39;,

      // Size
      sizeClass.card,

      // Variant styles
      variantClasses[variant],

      // Loading state
      loading &amp;&amp; &#39;pointer-events-none&#39;,

      // Disabled state
      disabled &amp;&amp; &#39;opacity-60 cursor-not-allowed&#39;,

      className
    );

    const hasHeader = header || title || subtitle;
    const hasFooter = footer;
    const isClickable = onClick &amp;&amp; !disabled &amp;&amp; !loading;

    return (
      &lt;div
        ref={ref}
        className={cardClasses}
        onClick={isClickable ? onClick : undefined}
        role={isClickable ? &#39;button&#39; : undefined}
        tabIndex={isClickable ? 0 : undefined}
        onKeyDown={
          isClickable
            ? e =&gt; {
                if (e.key === &#39;Enter&#39; || e.key === &#39; &#39;) {
                  e.preventDefault();
                  onClick?.(e as any);
                }
              }
            : undefined
        }
        aria-selected={selected}
        aria-disabled={disabled}
        {...props}
      &gt;
        {/* Loading overlay */}
        {loading &amp;&amp; (
          &lt;div className=&quot;absolute inset-0 bg-white bg-opacity-80 rounded-inherit flex items-center justify-center z-10&quot;&gt;
            &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center gap-2 text-graphite-600&quot;&gt;
              &lt;div className=&quot;w-4 h-4 border-2 border-graphite-300 border-t-blue-600 rounded-full animate-spin&quot; /&gt;
              &lt;span className=&quot;text-sm&quot;&gt;Loading...&lt;/span&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        )}

        &lt;div className={sizeClass.gap}&gt;
          {/* Header */}
          {hasHeader &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;div
              className={cn(
                hasFooter || children ? sizeClass.headerPadding : sizeClass.padding,
                headerDivider &amp;&amp; &#39;border-b border-graphite-200&#39;,
                headerClassName
              )}
            &gt;
              {header || (
                &lt;div className=&quot;space-y-1&quot;&gt;
                  {title &amp;&amp; (
                    &lt;h3
                      className={cn(
                        &#39;font-semibold text-graphite-900&#39;,
                        size === &#39;sm&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-sm&#39;,
                        size === &#39;md&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-base&#39;,
                        size === &#39;lg&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-lg&#39;,
                        size === &#39;xl&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-xl&#39;
                      )}
                    &gt;
                      {title}
                    &lt;/h3&gt;
                  )}
                  {subtitle &amp;&amp; (
                    &lt;p
                      className={cn(
                        &#39;text-graphite-600&#39;,
                        size === &#39;sm&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-xs&#39;,
                        size === &#39;md&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-sm&#39;,
                        size === &#39;lg&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-sm&#39;,
                        size === &#39;xl&#39; &amp;&amp; &#39;text-base&#39;
                      )}
                    &gt;
                      {subtitle}
                    &lt;/p&gt;
                  )}
                &lt;/div&gt;
              )}
            &lt;/div&gt;
          )}

          {/* Body */}
          {children &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;div
              className={cn(
                hasHeader &amp;&amp; hasFooter
                  ? sizeClass.bodyPadding
                  : hasHeader
                    ? sizeClass.footerPadding
                    : hasFooter
                      ? sizeClass.headerPadding
                      : sizeClass.padding,
                bodyClassName
              )}
            &gt;
              {children}
            &lt;/div&gt;
          )}

          {/* Footer */}
          {hasFooter &amp;&amp; (
            &lt;div
              className={cn(
                hasHeader || children ? sizeClass.footerPadding : sizeClass.padding,
                footerDivider &amp;&amp; &#39;border-t border-graphite-200&#39;,
                footerClassName
              )}
            &gt;
              {footer}
            &lt;/div&gt;
          )}
        &lt;/div&gt;
      &lt;/div&gt;
    );
  }
);

Card.displayName = &#39;Card&#39;;

export default Card;
📄 packages/cli/src/utils/__tests__/git-detection.test.ts
import { beforeEach, describe, expect, it, mock } from &#39;bun:test&#39;;
import type { GitHubRepo } from &#39;../../types.js&#39;;
import {
  createRepositoryConfig,
  detectRepositoryConflicts,
  getSmartRepositoryConfig,
  parseGitHubUrl,
  validateRepositoryConfig,
} from &#39;../git-detection.js&#39;;

describe(&#39;git-detection&#39;, () =&gt; {
  describe(&#39;parseGitHubUrl&#39;, () =&gt; {
    it(&#39;should parse HTTPS GitHub URLs&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const result = parseGitHubUrl(&#39;https://github.com/owner/repo.git&#39;);
      expect(result).toEqual({
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;https://github.com/owner/repo.git&#39;,
        type: &#39;https&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should parse HTTPS GitHub URLs without .git extension&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const result = parseGitHubUrl(&#39;https://github.com/owner/repo&#39;);
      expect(result).toEqual({
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;https://github.com/owner/repo&#39;,
        type: &#39;https&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should parse SSH GitHub URLs&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const result = parseGitHubUrl(&#39;git@github.com:owner/repo.git&#39;);
      expect(result).toEqual({
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;git@github.com:owner/repo.git&#39;,
        type: &#39;ssh&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should parse SSH GitHub URLs without .git extension&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const result = parseGitHubUrl(&#39;git@github.com:owner/repo&#39;);
      expect(result).toEqual({
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;git@github.com:owner/repo&#39;,
        type: &#39;ssh&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should return null for non-GitHub URLs&#39;, () =&gt; {
      expect(parseGitHubUrl(&#39;https://gitlab.com/owner/repo.git&#39;)).toBeNull();
      expect(parseGitHubUrl(&#39;https://bitbucket.org/owner/repo.git&#39;)).toBeNull();
      expect(parseGitHubUrl(&#39;not-a-url&#39;)).toBeNull();
    });
  });

  describe(&#39;detectRepositoryConflicts&#39;, () =&gt; {
    it(&#39;should return null when there are no conflicts&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const configRepo: GitHubRepo = { owner: &#39;owner&#39;, repo: &#39;repo&#39; };
      const detectedRepo = {
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;https://github.com/owner/repo.git&#39;,
        type: &#39;https&#39; as const,
      };

      const conflict = detectRepositoryConflicts(configRepo, detectedRepo);
      expect(conflict).toBeNull();
    });

    it(&#39;should detect owner conflicts&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const configRepo: GitHubRepo = { owner: &#39;config-owner&#39;, repo: &#39;repo&#39; };
      const detectedRepo = {
        owner: &#39;detected-owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;https://github.com/detected-owner/repo.git&#39;,
        type: &#39;https&#39; as const,
      };

      const conflict = detectRepositoryConflicts(configRepo, detectedRepo);
      expect(conflict).toEqual({
        configRepo,
        detectedRepo,
        conflictType: &#39;owner&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should detect repo conflicts&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const configRepo: GitHubRepo = { owner: &#39;owner&#39;, repo: &#39;config-repo&#39; };
      const detectedRepo = {
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;detected-repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;https://github.com/owner/detected-repo.git&#39;,
        type: &#39;https&#39; as const,
      };

      const conflict = detectRepositoryConflicts(configRepo, detectedRepo);
      expect(conflict).toEqual({
        configRepo,
        detectedRepo,
        conflictType: &#39;repo&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should detect both owner and repo conflicts&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const configRepo: GitHubRepo = { owner: &#39;config-owner&#39;, repo: &#39;config-repo&#39; };
      const detectedRepo = {
        owner: &#39;detected-owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;detected-repo&#39;,
        url: &#39;https://github.com/detected-owner/detected-repo.git&#39;,
        type: &#39;https&#39; as const,
      };

      const conflict = detectRepositoryConflicts(configRepo, detectedRepo);
      expect(conflict).toEqual({
        configRepo,
        detectedRepo,
        conflictType: &#39;both&#39;,
      });
    });
  });

  describe(&#39;validateRepositoryConfig&#39;, () =&gt; {
    it(&#39;should validate valid repository config&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const config: GitHubRepo = {
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        baseUrl: &#39;https://api.github.com&#39;,
        tokenEnv: &#39;GITHUB_TOKEN&#39;,
      };

      const result = validateRepositoryConfig(config);
      expect(result.valid).toBe(true);
      expect(result.errors).toHaveLength(0);
      expect(result.suggestions).toHaveLength(0);
    });

    it(&#39;should require owner and repo&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const config: GitHubRepo = {};

      const result = validateRepositoryConfig(config);
      expect(result.valid).toBe(false);
      expect(result.errors).toContain(&#39;Repository owner is required&#39;);
      expect(result.errors).toContain(&#39;Repository name is required&#39;);
    });

    it(&#39;should validate base URL format&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const config: GitHubRepo = {
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        baseUrl: &#39;invalid-url&#39;,
      };

      const result = validateRepositoryConfig(config);
      expect(result.valid).toBe(false);
      expect(result.errors).toContain(&#39;Base URL must start with https://&#39;);
    });

    it(&#39;should provide suggestions for common mistakes&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const config: GitHubRepo = {
        owner: &#39;owner/repo&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo.git&#39;,
      };

      const result = validateRepositoryConfig(config);
      expect(result.valid).toBe(false);
      expect(result.suggestions).toContain(`Did you mean owner: &quot;owner&quot;, repo: &quot;repo&quot;?`);
      expect(result.suggestions).toContain(
        `Repository name should not include .git extension: &quot;repo&quot;`
      );
    });
  });

  describe(&#39;createRepositoryConfig&#39;, () =&gt; {
    it(&#39;should create repository config with defaults&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const result = createRepositoryConfig(&#39;owner&#39;, &#39;repo&#39;);
      expect(result).toEqual({
        owner: &#39;owner&#39;,
        repo: &#39;repo&#39;,
        tokenEnv: &#39;GITHUB_TOKEN&#39;,
      });
    });

    it(&#39;should merge with base config&#39;, () =&gt; {
      const baseConfig = {
